item.text: rgyagar skad du/
Ar+ya dashas pasu kA yudzupA/
bod skad du/'phags pa shes
bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang bang chab se
rgyal po'i khab/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong phrag duma'i dag slong gi dge 'dun
tshan po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zado
bya
pa/ nyomos pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur ba/ soms shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par
grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byakha/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid
gi dam pa'i la rtsol tu son pa sha stag ste// gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa/ tshe dang ldan
kun dga' bo'o// dgaslongam lnga brgya tsam dang/ dag bsnyan dang/ dag bstanam thams cad kyang bden pa sha stag dang nga
mnag
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag dum thams cad kyang gzus thob pa/ ting ba'adzin thob pa/ stong ba nyid la
gnas pa/ mtshan mamadapa'i spyodayul ba/ ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa// spobs pa thogs pa med pa
thob pa/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa// tshul 'chos pa med pa// shes kyi khe dang/ rnyed pa dang//
bkur sti'isams dang bral ba// zang zung med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ bdud kyi las
las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ rten pa'i chos ston pas bsags pa/ bskal pa gras med pa
nas smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin khro gnya mad pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis
tsaganon pa'i ma 'jigs pa dang ldan pa// bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bstan ngas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas ba/ chos la sgyu ma dang 2 smag rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang 2 chu zla dang/ lce
mag yor dang nam mkha' dang brag cha dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ gzugs bar n dang/ sprul pa lta bur mos pa/ ma 'jigs pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa
sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi spyod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ phra ma mkhyen pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad dang zhe 'gras pa med pa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa// ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par smon lam yongs su bzung ba// 'jig rten
gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad pa mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/ blta
ba sna tshogs kyis kun nas ldang pa'i nyon mongs pa slong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sha stag la 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang/ dkona mchog 'byung gnas dang/ dang dpon dar 2 nalaso byin dang/ gza' sa byin dang/ chu lhas byan dang/
dbang pos byin dang/ blo gros rgyatshan dang/ blo gros khyad par can dang/ blo gros 'phal dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ shin tu yang dag zhugs dang/
rab kyatshal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang/ rtag tu brtson dang/ brtson pa ma gtong ba dang/ nyi ma'i snying bo dang/ zla ba'i snying po dang/ blo gros deb med dung/ spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ lag na phyag ran po che dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bskyang dang// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po/
byams pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas/ 'khor bzhi po dag gi mdun na lham me lhan ne lhang nge zhing/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma yang dag par bstan to// spu'i khung bu rnams nas kyang 'odra zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to// yang de'atshe tshe dang
ldan pa shAr tra ti'i bu 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la ya res te/ rab tu mgu zhing
dga' ba dang/ padi bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pasamo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skyabs
phyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das labadag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan pas kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
'di skad ces bka' stsal do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i phyir rtag tu skabs phyi zin gyis/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dras shag dang/
dris pa de dang de'i lan btabar sa khyod kyisims rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i yus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang gi
pha rol tu phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu sonapa lags shang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
ca @#// rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
za shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legasaso// 'di ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyon gyi rlabs kyis zhu ba zhus pa mdzes so// khyod kyi yongs su rtog pa bzung ngo// de'i phyir khyod legs pa
rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa
dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa mad pa
man no// gshA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mngon par zhen pa med pa rnams/ shes rab kyi
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la mngon
! par zhen par ma bgyid pa'i chos de dag thams cad gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad cesabya ba// 'di lta ste/ phu bo lnga dang//
bya mched bcu gnyis dang khams bco brgyad dang/ 'phags pa 'a 'dan pa ba zhi dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung rnga' lan lag bcu gnyis dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/
yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
bdang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa 'di dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa mad pa nyade dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/
tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i sims par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang shu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ 'du shes
dgu dang/ rjes su dran pa bcu dang/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug rung/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes pa dang de
sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byungashes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam shes pa dang/ zad pa shes pa dang/ ma skye ba shes pa dang/ ji lta ba bzhin shes pa dang/ bzhan
du rtog pa dang cas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi rtog ma ripyod pa 'a ting nge 'dzin dang/ ma shes pa kun shes
/par byed pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa'i debang po dang/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang zad bar
gyi skye mched bcu dang/ stong pa nyade btsobargyad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi deng/ byams pa chen
po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
ba nyid dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ mig lnga dang/ skyes bu chen po' mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cu pa/
dag ste/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par zhen par ma bya ba'i chos thams cad na de dag yin no// mngon par zhen pa med pa na shes rab kyi phe
rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yan zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phung po lnga gang lags shes bya ba nas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro// dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi gang lags bya ba nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang lags bya ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du spyar ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang lags bya ba nas/ dpe byad bzang
bo brgyad cu po de dag ces bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyararo// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu phung pe 'al zhes bya ba na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'o//
de la skye mched bcu gnyis gang zhen nang ga drug dang/ phyi'i drug ste/ du dgun skye mched bcugatisangashes bya'o// de la nang gaskye mched drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
mag gi skye mched dang/ rnaba'askye mched dang/ sna'i skye mched dang/ lce'i skye mched dang/ lus kyi skye mched dang/ yid kyi skye mched de/ de dag ni nang gi skye mched drug
ces bya'o// de la phyi'i skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang/ sgra'i skye mched dang/ dri'i skye mched dang/ re'i spyi mchod dang/ reg bya'i skye
ma chad dang/ chos kyi skye mched dang/ de dgan phyi'i skye mched drug ces bya'o// de la khams bco brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mgi ga khams dang//
gzugs kyi khams dang shA mag gli rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ rna ba'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams dang/ rnaba' rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/
dra'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ las kyi khams rang/ reg bya
N+NaM khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ de dag na khams bco brgyad ces bya'o[/]
bde la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ kun 'byung 'phags pa' bden pa dang/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden
ba dang/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ste du dag na 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
ma rag pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rgyan gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mang dang gzugs/ mang dang gzugs kyi skye mched drug//
mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa ra rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid ba/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i skyon gyis sridi ba/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis bya ba
skya ba'i skyon gyis ga sha dang/ mya ngan dang/ smegs 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yadem bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal/
bung po chen bo 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag 1 rnam par shes pa 'gags
pas mang dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag[}]
tshor ba 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas
rgasha 'gag/ rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yadi ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/ de ltar na
sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur te/ dan rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang 'thun pa dang/ lugs dang mi
mthun pa zhes bya'o// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la las kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ tshor ba la ra
ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa dang/ sams lasams kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba' dren pa nye bar gzhag pa ste//
de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhu zhes bya'o// de la yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dra la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa ma dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
ma skyid pa'i phyir/ 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sams rab tu 'dzan cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang/ sdig pa ma dge ba'i tshos skyes pa rnams
spang ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom sta/ sems rab tu 'dzan cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyar pa'i phyir/
bdun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sams rab tu 'dzin cang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang/ ma rjod pa dang/
shin tu rgyas pa dang/ phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bdun pa skyed cing 'bad labartson 'grus rtsom sta/ sams rab tu kha dzan nga yang dag par rab tu 'jog
pa ste/ de dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdun pa ting nge 'dzan sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa dang/ brtson 'grusakyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ soms kyi ting nge 'dzani spong ba' 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/

spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'a'i du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i
dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi dbang po dung/ shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag na dbang po lnga zhes bya'o//
de la stobs lta gang zhen/ 'di lta sta de bzhin du dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi stobs dang/ shes
rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang dwa chos rab tu rnam par
'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang shani tu sbangs pa yang dag/
byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag na byang chub kyi ya na 'ag/
bdun zhes bya'o// de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtag pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/
yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dwang 2 yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i teng nge 'dzin te/ de dgan
'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa zhes bya'o/ 'del rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa zhing gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cud rang ga mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i

ts+tsalasems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de/ de na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 'di myos bya'o// de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med par so ser kun tu rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/ de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma dad pa zhes bya'o/ de la rnan
par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la/ mngon par 'du byed pa med par soms gnas pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i/
sgo ste/ de na rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa zhes bya'o// de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa ma dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa//
rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' bdang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang phro la zhing nang
yongs su dang sta sams kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzan las rgyas pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang
de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas nig shang dran bya dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'bags pa rnams kyis gang dran pa dang
ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba mad pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de bde ba'ang sangs te/ snga nas
sdug bsngal yang spungs shang/ yid bde ba dang yadi ma bde ba'ang nub pas/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang me yani/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pas/
bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag na bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya'o// de la tshad mad pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang/ sang rje dang/
dga' btang/ btang snyoms te/ de dag ni tshad mad pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na// 'di lta sta/ nam mkha'i
mtha' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ tsa'ang med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'ang shes med mni skye mched de/ de dag na gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'ad lta sta/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du
shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gas pa'o// sdug pa 'di du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'jushes rnams nub cang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la ma byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha'i ma tha'
yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mched las yang dag par 'angs te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas/
pa'i rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang mang ngo snyam nas
ci'ing med pa'i skye mched bslabs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du su'ang mad pa'i skye mched las yang dag bor 'das te/ 'dushes mad 'du shesamad na skya
mchad nye bar bsgrubs te gnasaM pa 'dani rnam par thar pa bdun pa 'o// dre rnamab thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mneskya mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dushes dang tshor ba 'gog/
pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'dan rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o// de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dag gang zhe na/ 'dalta ste/
'dod po dag las dben pa/ stage pa ma dge ba'i chos rnams las dbenapa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde ba can bsam
gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 'dra ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang po'o// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang sta/ sams kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med nga dpyod pa/
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni sems par 'jug pa gnyis pa'o// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang/
snyoms la gnas shing/ dran pa dang shes bzhin can lan te/ bde pa lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ 2 btang snyoms pa'o zhes barjod ba
sta dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'dan snyoms par 'jug pa gsum pa'o// de bde ba'ang sngangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing
pa'i bde ba dang 'di ma be de brkub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yani/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas/
ba 'dan soms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cang/
sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yadi la ma byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di na sims par 'jug
ba lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas
zla/ skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'ad ni snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam/
nas 'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang mad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'dus te/ 'du shes
la da 'du shes med mne skya mchod bsgrubs te gnas pa 'disnyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes mad min skye mched las yang dag par
'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog bya bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyisa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//
de la 'du shes dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par 'bus gzhig pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang/ rnam
par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par 'thor ba' 'du shes dang/ rus gong ga 'du shes dang/
rnam par tshagi pa'i 'du shes te/ de dag na 'du shes dgu zhes bya'o// de la rjes su dran pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'ad lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ sa rjes
su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong nga rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ na bar zhi ba rjes su dran ba dang/
dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjesasu dran pa dang/ lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/ de dag ni rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya'o// de la 'du sa
kyi rnam pa drug gang zhen/ 'du lta ste/ ma rtog pa'i 'du shes dang/ sdug bsngal pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang/ ma sdug pa'i 'du
shes dang/ 'chab ' 'du shes dang/ 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba' 'du shes te/ de dag ni 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya'o// de la chos shes pa gang zhen/
phung bo lnga po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya ba la yos su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yan pa ste/ de na tshos shes pa zhes bya'o// de la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ mgi ma rtag
go zhes bya bar shes pa gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yadi dang/ gzugs dang/ smra dang/ dri deng/ ro dang/
reg bya dang/ chos rnams ma rtog go zhes bya bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ du na rjes su rtog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la pha rol kyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/ sems
k+Sha nyid kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sams dung sems las byung ba'i tshes rnams la the tshem med par shes pa ste/ de na pha rol gyi sems shes pa
zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa gang yin pa sta/ de nakun rdzob shes pa zhes bya'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal
skye ba dang gnas bar shes pa ste/ de ma sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba sbyong ba gang yin pa ste/ de na kun 'byung ba shes pa/
zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de na lam shes pa zhes bya'o// dra la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na// 'dod chags dang kun snang dang/ gti
mug rnams zad par shes pa gang yin pa ste dan zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la tha su bshes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams sum skye bar shes pa sa/ de na mi skye ba
shes pa zhes bya'o// de la ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang yin pa sta/ ngani ja lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o//
don ji lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o// de la ma yi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi red pa'i dbang po dang/
brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i debang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang 2 shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de na mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes
de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/
dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de nakun shes pa'i debang po zhes bya'o// de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i debang po gang
zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa 'di lta ste/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ tang nga 'dzan gyi dbang po dang/
shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzani gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dban
blo pa sdug pa ma dge ba'i chos dag las dben pa/ dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa ste// da ni rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzan ces bya'o//
de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang/ bsam gtan gnyas pa'i bar gang yin pa sta/ de na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin/
cas bya'o// de la ma rtog ma dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzan gang zhen/ bsam gtan dang po nas bzung sta/ 'du shes meda'adu shes mad man skya mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa ste//
de na mi rtog ma dpyod pa'i dong nge 'dzan ces bya'o// de la zal gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol kyi gzugs chung ngu
kha dog bzang bo dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/ de lta bur 'dus shes par gyur pa de na zal gyis gnon pa'i skye mched/
dang bo'o// rlung gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing/ gzugs de dag zal gyis mnan nas
shes zal gyis mnan nas mthong// de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes phis phyi srol gyi
gzugs sngon po// kha dog sngon po// sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/ dper na zar ma'i ma tog gam/ yul wA rA Na sa'i res
phun sum tshogs pa sngon bo/ kha dog sngon bo/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ]
sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa// 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs
med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sar po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta sta/ par na dong kha'i mi rtog gam/ yul
wArANA sa'i ris phun sum tshogs pa sor po// kha dog ser po/ sar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs mad par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
gzugs sar po kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa// 'od sar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zol gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du
shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa// 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta sta/ dpar na ban du dza ba'i me tog gam/
yul wA rA Nasa'i ris phun sum tshogs pa dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar bo lta bur ston pa// 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes
pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar bo/ kha dog dmar po ]dmar bo lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs
mad bar 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar bo lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/ dparan skar ma pa lnga/
sangasakyi mdog dkar po/ kha dog dkar bo/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi
rol gyi gzugs dkar ngo/ kha dog dkar po 1 dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/ de na zol kyis gnon pa'i skye mched
drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du
shes rnams yadi la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zol kyis gnon pa'i skye mched
bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'jus te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas
skye mchad bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zol kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa// de dag na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o// de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zad par sa dang/ zad par chu dang/ zed par ma dang/ zad par rlung dang/ thod par nam mkha'/
dang zad par sngon po dang/ zad par ser po dang/ zad par dmar po dang/ zad par dkar po dang/ zad par rnam par shes pa ste/ de dag na zad par
gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/ khams thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/ khams thams cad kyang sa' khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro// khams thams
dachu'i khams su mos par byed do/ khams thams cad kyang chu' khams kho nar khams gtsag tu 'gyur ro// khams thams cad ma' khams su mos par byed de/ khams
thams cad kyang ma'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro// khams thams cad rlung ga khams su mos par byed de/ khams thams cad kyang rlung ga khams kho nar khams gcig
tu 'gyur ro// khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams su mos par byed de/ de thams cad kyang nam mkha' khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro// khams thams cad
sngon por mos par byed de/ de thams cad kyang ston pa nyid du 'gyur ro// khams thams cad ser por mos par byed de/ de thams cad kyang ser po kho nar 'gyur ro//
khams thams cad dmar bor mos par byed da/ de thams cad kyang dmar po khe nar 'gyur ro// khams thams cad dkar par mos par byed de/ de thams cad kyang dkar po 'o
nar 'gyur ro// thams cad rnam par shes par mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang rnam bar shes ba kho nar khams gtsag tu 'gyur ro// sa dang/ chudang 2 ma dang/
rlung dang/ nam mkha' dang/ sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang gtsage kho nar 'gyur te/
dun zad par kyi skye mched rnams shes bya'o// zad par du skye ba rgyas par byed pas/ de na zad par skye mched rnams shes bya'o// re re'ang skya mchod thams cad du 'gyur te
de'i phyir zad par kyi skye mched rnams shes bya'o// de la stong pa nyid bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ]nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa
nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa 'di dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pastong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong
pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang/
zu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na// nang gi chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mag dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang//
lce dang/ lus dang/ yadi de/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mig ni mig gis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang
bzhin du yan pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ pad
ni yad kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de ya na pa'i phyir te/ de na nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la pa stong pa nyid
gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang 'u reg pa dang/ chos rnams te/ de la zer zug
tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ gzugs rnams na gzugs kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i ring bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin
du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong ngo// da ci'i/
phyir zhe na/ de' ring bzhani de yan pa'i phyir te/ de na phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi nang ga chos rnams shes bya ba na 1 nang ga skye mched/
drug dang/ phyi'i skye mched drug dang/ de la thar zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ nang gi chos rnams na ning ga chos rnams kyis stong ngo// datsa'i phyir
zhen de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa mad pa'i phyir/ phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo// de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir te/ de na phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhen/ thar zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jag pa med pa'i
par chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des kyang 1 chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyidi stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir te/ dan stong
pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chen po stong pa 'di gang zhe na/ zer zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shar phyogs na shar phyogs kyis stong ngo/
da pa'i phyir zhe na/ de'i ring bzhin du yan pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'ge pa med pa'i phyir lho dang/ ba dang/
byang dang/ phyogs mtshams bzhi ste/ phyogs de brgyud kyang de bzhin no// stangag phyogs na sang ga phyogs kyis stong ngo// 'og gi phyogs na 'og ga phyogs kyis stong ngo// de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir de/ de nu chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba la//
don dam pa zhes bya ba na mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa de da pa dang/ 'jag pa med pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa na mya ngan las 'das
pas stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir te/ de na don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus/
byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa 'a khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jag pa med
cha pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'dod pa' khams kyis stong ngo// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams na gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo// gzugs med pa'i khams na
bas/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyirate/ de na'i dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
krang zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba na chos gang la skye ba med pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa dang/ gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ de la
ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas na 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/
da na 'dus ma byas stong pa 'di ces bya'o// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na zer zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jige pa mad pa'i phyi'i/ chos
gang la skye ba shin tu mo dimigs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'arang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir te/ de na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyud ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma med
pastong pa nyidi gung zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ chos gang la 'ong ba ma dam gas pa 'o// de ci'i phywa'i zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin re
yan pa'i phyir te/ de na thig ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la dor kha med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med
pa'i phye'i/ chos gang la chos gang yang dor du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir/ da na der ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/
de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa mad pa dang/ 'jag pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin/
gang yin pa de na nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyis ma mdzad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de na reng bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 'di gang zhe
na rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba la/ gzugs rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid na myong ba/ 'dushes kyi mtshan 'di na kun tu shes par byed
pa 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid na mngon par 'du byed pa// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid na rnam par shes par byed pa ste/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang lags
pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/ bar zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mtshan nyid
de dag thams cad rang ga mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir// de narang ga mtshan 'di stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chos thams
cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba na phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gags dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ chos gzugs can rnams
dang gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/
'jig pa mad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de na chos thams cad stong pa nyid
ces bya'o// de la ma dmigs pa stong pa 'de gang zhe na/ de yang ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang/ 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ma dmags pa gang yin
pa'o da ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yan pa'i phyir te/ de na mi dmags pa stong pa 'di ces bya'o// de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dngos
bo 'ga' yang ma dmagis te/ de na dengos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la ngo sde 'di stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yang med pa ste/
de na ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ de la dngos po med pa'i ngobo 'di stong pa nyade gang zhe na/'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo 'di 'ga' yang mad pa ste/
dan dngos po med pa'i nge po nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo// dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo/ 'angobo nyid ni
ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo// gzhan gyi dngos po na gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo// de la dngos po gang zhe na/ dngos po zhes bya ba na/ phung po lnga po rnams te/ 'ad
lta ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ste/ de la dngos po na dngos pos stong ngo/ jiltar
lto na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pas// de la 'dus ma byas na'adus ma byas kyis stong ngo// de bzhin du dngos
blo po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo// ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo 'di gang yin pa da na shes pas kyang ma byas/ mthong bas/
kyang ma byas/ gang gis ma byas pa ste 2 de na ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar na gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshags
pa rnams byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung/ chos rnams kyi tshos gnas pa 'di dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang
de bzhin nyid dang/ phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa' mtha' na gnas pa 'di de/ chos de dag ga gzhan gyis
stong pa gang yan pa de na gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyis dngos pos stong pa zhes bya ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par zhen par ma
bya ba'i tshes thams cad na de dag yan no/ mngon par zhen pa med pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing/ skyar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so//// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa khri pa bam po gnyis pa/// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shar dAta'i bu de la de bzhin
gshegs pa 'a stobs bcu gang zhe na/ da lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas la 'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gnas ma yin pa
de la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang/
las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang/ rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ 'jage rtan du khams sna tshogs yang
dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ des sems can gzhan dag dang/ gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs 'di dang/ mos pa du ma nyid yang dag
pa rdza lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ des sems can gzhan dag dang/ gang brag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa 'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes pa dang/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/
rnam par thar pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam bar byung ba dang ldan pa shes pa yang
dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi'apho dang skye pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
thadaM ba dang/ zag pa rnams zad pas sams rnam par grol ba dang/ shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas/
shang bdag ga skye ba na zad do//tshangs par spyod pa na spyad do// bdag ga bya ba na byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan ma shes so zhes bya ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i
bu de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa' stobs bcu yan no// shAr dra ta'i bu de la ma 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa
na 'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am 1 bdud dam/ tshongs pa ma/
su'ang rung ba 'ga' 'a jag rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ sa rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste gnas shing
bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ ma 'jigs pa thob ste gnas kyis/ khyu mchog rlabs po che' gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags go/
tshangs pa' 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba rab tu khaskor
tha @#// re zhes bya ba dang/ nga zag pa zad de zhes dam bcas na/ 'dar zag pa 'ad dag ma zad do zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/
bdud dam/ rmongs pa 'am/ su 'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mashong ste/ ngas rgya de yang dag par
rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste gnas shing/ bag tsha ba med pa theb la/ ma 'jigs pa thob ste gnas kyis/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o/ 'khor/
gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor le sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshus pa 'am sus kyang 'a rdzag rten na
chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba bskor re zhes bya ba dang/ sa bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag stan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/ de na gnas med do zhes dam bcas na/
'dir dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam[.]tshangs pa 'am/ su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rje[”']ka' rgyu med pa skas pa la rjes
ma mthong ste/ ngas rgyud yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong bas bde ba thobasti gnas shing/ bag tshab med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste gnas kyis/ khyu mchog rlabs bo che'i gnas su dam
bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor le sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus/
kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba bskor ro zhes bya ba dang/ ngas nyan thos rnams la 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa/ nges par 'byed pa/ de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag/
par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam kung bshad pa bsgrubs na/ nges par 'byin pa ma yin zhing/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par ma 'gyur te/ de na gnas med do zhes dam bcas na//
'di'i dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'om/ bdud dam 1 tshangs pa 'am/ su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong ste/ ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob sta gnas shing/ bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ ma 'dzags pa thob ste gnas kyis/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i
gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags go tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdudu dam tshangs
pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i bar du bskor ro zhes bya ste/ de dag na mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la so so yang dag par ragi pa bzhi gang zhen
'di lta sta/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang 2 sbobs pa so so yang
dag par rag ste/ de dag naso so yang dag par rag pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de la byams pa chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhun gshegs pa samasacan thams cad la phyogs dang dza'
bshes la 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yan pa ste/ de na byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// de la sang rje chen po gang zhe na/ sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams
pa ma gtong ba gang yan pa sta/ de na sAng rje chen po zhes bya'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bu 'khrul pa/
mad pa dang/ caco med pa dang/ bsnyel ba med pa dang/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang/ sems ma3ma par ma gzhug pa med pa dang 2 so sor ma brtags pa'i btang
soms med pa dang/ 'dun pa 3mas pa med pa dang/ brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang/ dran pa nyams pa med pa dang/ dwang nge 'dzin nyams pa mad pa dang/ shes rab nyams/
pa med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang/ lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro 'di ya shas
wakyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ ngag ga las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ yad kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhang ye shes kyi rjes su
'brang ba dang/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogasapa' ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang/ da ltar
byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs nga 'a yi shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o// de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang zhe na/
kan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams sku mched bcu gnyis po dag la/ gang zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de na thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya'o// de la
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam shes pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pas dag par ma sems kyi/ byang chub sems/
dpa' lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa ste/ den lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum
po dag tu rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la the tshom med par mkhyen pa gang yin pa ste/ de na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na//
/'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ zod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag na pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di
lta sta/ bya ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i mig shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon
sum du bya ba shes pa' mngon par shes pa dang/ pha rol bya samangags ma mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ ston kyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sam du drung
shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du shes pa'i mngon par shes pa/ de dgan mngon par shes pa drug ces bya'o// de la mag lnga gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ sha'i mag dang/ lha'i mig dang/ shes rab kyi mig dang/ chos kyi mgo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mag ste/ du dag na yage lnga zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das na zhabs shani tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yan no// de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa na 'di yan te/
0 zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa ste/ dpar na za ma tog ga zhabs mnyam zhing zhabs phyang nge ba sa gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la gzhag na/ 'og ga zhabs thams/
cad kyases la kun tu reg par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das na zhabs shan tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa yin no// de la
mu spyod khor yug dang ldan pa na 'du yan sta/ zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs pa 1 mdzes par skyes pa gang dag yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das na phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa yan no// de la phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon
chags pa 'di na 'ad yin te/ dper na shang bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ral bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu ste/ ji ltar ma gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yan no// bcom ldan 'das na sir mo rang ba yan no//

de lasor mo range ba nyid na 'ad yin te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs kyi ser mo dag lhag par rang ba yan te/ ji ltar ma gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'dasan phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan paM

yani te/ de' phyag dang zhabs dra ba lhag pa dag skyas te/ jaltar ma gzhan dag la mad pa lta bu yan no// bcom ldan 'das na rtang nga yangs pa dang ldan pa yan no// de la rtang pa yangs pa na 'ad yin te/
'de' zhabs kyi rtong pa gnyas kyi mthal na yangs pa ste/ ji ltar ma gzhan dag la med nga lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'das na de bas long mo'i tshigs ma mngon pa lanano// de la
zhabs khong bu'i tshags ma mngon pa nyid na 'ad yanite/ rnying pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/ rtang pa yangs pa'i ng zhabs long bu'atshigs ma mi don pa la sbyor ba ste/ jaltar mgazhan dag
kha med pa de lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'dasan byin pa ri dgas a mya ya' lta bu dang ldan pa yan no// de la byin par dgas a rgya ya'i lha bun 'di yin te/ de'i byon pa khyon gyis phra bar skyes
shang byon gyis phra bar yang dag par byung ba ste/ dper na ra rigs kyi rgyal po e rgya ya' lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'das na bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor sleb pa yan no// de la
ba zhengs pa zhan du ma btud par phyag pus me la slob pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das na bzhengs na sku ma btud par phyag ga mthil gnyis kyis rang gapas mo'i lha nga la yang dag nges na
mdzad tsang kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin no// bcom ldan 'angs na mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no// de la mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'di na'i da yin te/ dper na gis btsun
pa'i glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shos kyi lta bu yan no// bcom ldan 'das na spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shang g.yas su 'khyil ba yan no// de la lnga re re nas mdzes par skyes ngashari
g.yas su 'khyil ba nyid na 'ad yan te/ da' smyu'i khung bu re re nas/ snga rer mthon mthing la lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil tsang mdzes par skyes pa yan no// bcom ldan

'das na sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang ldan pa yin no// de la sku' lce gyen du phyogs pa 'di na 'ad yan te/ de' sku dang dbu las skyes ma'i dbu skra dang smra rnams na kha gyen du bltas shang/ mthon mtha'i
la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyal pa mdzes par s+yas pa yanano// bcom ldan 'das ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa yan no// de la pags pa srab
tsang 'a jam la snum pa na 'ad yanitaM/ dang sku la chu'am rdul kun tu mtshegasangashari mi gnas pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni mdog gsar lta bu dang ldan te// dpar na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i
gser gyi mchod sdong la rani po chesna tshogs kyis smras pa lta bur gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa yin te/ des ni gsar gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ni bdun bgro
ba lanano// de la bdun mtho ba da na 'di yin te/ de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gags bzang zhing mdzas la blta na sdug pa/ sha dang khrag gis yangs su rgyas par gyur pa dang/ de
khazhan du phyag gnyis kyi mtho ba gnas kha zugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ sha dang khrag gas yongs su rgyas par gyur ba dang/ thal gong gnyis su gnyis mtho bar gyur pa dang/ ga nyar gong
@#// du mtho ba gcig gzugs bzang zhang mdzas la blta na sdug pa/ sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum
pa dang ldan pa yanano// bcom ldan 'das na thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das na ngashan tu drang por 'khrungs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni sku na gro d+ha ltar chu

zheng gab pa yan no// de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar sku chu zheng gab pa nyaden 'ad yin te/ chur ji srid pa zhing du'ang de srid pa/ zheng du ji srid pa rgyun yang de srade de/ de na rgya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng
gab pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das na 'gram pa sang ge'i dang 'dra ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das na tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yanano// bcom ldan 'das na tshems thags bzang
yani no// bcom ldan 'das ni tshems rtsa mo mtho zhing rno la dkar ba yin no/ bcom ldan 'das na ri bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i mgur drang bor mde pa drang zhing ma yo
sgra la thogs pa med par mdi du rung bar gyur pa yanino// bcom ldan 'das na ljags rang zhing srab pa yin no// de la ljags rang zhing srab pa nyid 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzheng na
zhal nas lcags phyung sta/ shangs kyi khung bu gnyis dang/ spyan gyi khung bu gnyis dang/ snyan gyi khung bu gnyis su reg par mdzad cing/ longs su chug bar mdzad la/ ngabu'a mtshams
su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang 'gegs par mdzad pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das na tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ya ni no// bcom ldan 'das ni spyan yangs pa tra rdza
lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'dasan namakhyon mthang lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das na spyan gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang ba yin no//
bcom ldan 'das nu zhal zla ba ka ba lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu s+san mtshams su 'khrungs la shing bal ltar 'jam zhing/ me tog kun da dang/ zla ba dang/ dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa
khag dang/ ba' 'i cha dang/ ba mo'i mdog lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin to/ de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis shes
bya'o de 23 dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhen/ 'ad lta sta/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// sred med kyi bu'i ltar sku grims pa yin no/
pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par gyur pa yin no// sku gtsang ba dag yin no// sku 'jam pa dag yanano/ sku mnyen pa dag yin no// sku snyam bag can drag yin no// sku ma btud pa rig lan no//
sor mo rnams rang ba dang byin gyis phra ba dag yin no// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na sor mo rnams zlum pa dag yin no// sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dag yanano/ rtsa rnams mi mngon
[fg]da/ pa dag yin no// long bu rnams ma mngon pa dag yin no// sku dbyibs legs pa dag yin no// sku shan tu legs par 'brel ba dag yin no// skya mched rnams/
shan tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no// mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa yan no// spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag yan no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na dpal dang blo gros dang ldan pa dag
lan no// blta bar 'os pa dag yin no// zhal ha cang yang ma rong ba dag yin no// zhal rkang rkyang med pa dag yin no// sgros bam pa ltar dmar ba dag yan no// zhal yongs su rgyas/
pa dag yin no// dbyangs zab pa dag yin no// lta ba zab pa dag yin no// lta ba g.yas su 'khyil ba dag yan no// phyag dang zhabs yongs su rgyas pa drag yin no// sangs rgyas bcom
ts+tsa ldan 'das rnams na phyag dang zhabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhani dang ldan pa dag yin no// phyag gi mthil mnyam pa dag yin no// phyag gar mi bar ma chad pa dag yin no// phyag ga re mi mtho ba dag
yin no// sku la dri ma med cing dra ma zhim pa med pa dag yin no//mdog gsal kha dag lan no// skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag lanano// zhal zla ba lta bu dag yin no// gsong por gsung ba dag
yin no// zhal khro gnyer gyi rim pa med pa dag yin no/ spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no// de dag gi zhal dri zhim pa dag yin no// seng ge 'i stabs su gshegs pa
dag yanano// glang po che'i dbang po'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no// ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yanino// dbu gdugs 'dra ba dag yin no/ gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad
yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no// tshoms mchab rob dang ldan pa dag yin ne/ shangs mtho ba dag yanano// ljags dmar padag yan no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
ljags srab cing che ba dag yin no// spyamathon mthing can dag yin no// sdu gtsang ba dag yanin// spyan yangs pa dag yin no// bu ga'i sgo rnams yongs su ma nyams pa dag
lanano// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthale dmar ba dag yin no/ lte ba ma bye ba drag yin no// dku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no// phyal phyang de ba dag yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni sku la gter ma med pa dag yin no// tshigs mdzes pa dag lan no// tshags rang ba dag yin no// phyag zhabs yongs su dag pa dag lanano// 'od 'dom gang mnyam
pa dag yin na// 'od kyis gsal bar mdzad cing gshegs pa dag yin no// lha dang ma gang dag gas sku mthong ba de dag tshim par 'gyur ro// srog chags thams cad kyis mthong yang
khanAs par ma byed do// sems can rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do// de dag ga gsung na 'khor dang 'thun par khyab par mdzad kyi/ 'khor gyi phyi rol du gsung a 'gro'o// ro stod/
seng ge lta bu dag yin no// sku'i tshigs legs par 'brel ba dag yan no// spyi gtsug bltar ma mthong ba dag yin no// dbu skra mthon mthade la 'jam zhing rang ba
dag yin no// dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dag yin no// dbu skra gyen du phyogs shang bzang la lcang lor 'khyilab dag yin no// dbu skra ma 'dzangs pa dag yan no// thugs kar dpal gyi
b.rus legs par brgyan pa dang ldan ba dag yan no// phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshams dwapal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na mtshal dang/ ldong
ros dang/ tsan bshad ng/ mthangashun dang/ zangs g.ya' kha dog gsi bras pa lta bu'i mtshan rnams dang ldan pa// de dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu zhes bya'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par ma bgyid na/ des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong lags te/ 'ang lta ste 'dzad dag
dge ba'i chos rnams so// 'di dag na mi dge ba'i chos rnams so// 'di dag na lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag na lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so// 'di deg na/
[4/ ]'dzag rten pa'i tshes rnams so// 'di dag na 'jag rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag na zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams
so 'di dag na de dus byas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag na 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag na thun mong ga chos rnams so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma lags pa'i chos rnams so/
zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ lam bsgrubasan ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade rjes su thob par 'gyur lags/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ de na kun rdzob yin gyi/ don dam par nam yan no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na kun rdzob tu lags kyi/ don dam par
na ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ de la 'gro nyan pa'i tshes dge ba rnams gang yin snyam du sems
pa las/ de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ phar 'dzan pa dang/ mar 'dzin pa dang/ dgasbyong du 'dzan pa dang/ bram zer 'dzan pa dang shA rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed
pa dang/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba'i dngos po dang/ bsgom pa las byung pa'i dngos po dang/ zhal ta
byed pa dang ldan pa 'a bsod nams dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang/ 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i/
'du shes dang/ rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par dmar ba' 'dushes dang/ rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes drang 'u rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du
shes dang/ rnam par zes pa'i 'du shes dang rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang/ rus gong ga 'dushes dang/ rnam par rig pa'i 'du shes dang/ de bzhin du bsam
gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes sudran pa
dang tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran ba dang/ lus su
gtog pa rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chib rjes su dran pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so// de la ma rig ba'i tshes rnams gang yin snyam pa las/ de 'dasnyam du
'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byan par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dad/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ gi rtsub mo dang/ ngag 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/
gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba dang/ khro ba dang lakhon du 'dzan pa dad/ 'chab pa dang/ 'tshig pa dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna
dang ngargyal te/ de dag ni ma dag pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so// de la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las/ de 'ad snyam du 'di lta ste/ lus/
kyi las lung du ma bstan pa dang/ ngag ga las lung du ma bstan pa dang/ yade kya las lung du ma bstan pa dang/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi lung du ma bstan pa dang/ dbang po lta lung du ma
bstan pa dang/ phung po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ rnam par smin pa sta/ de dag ni lung du ma stan pa'i chos rnams yin no//
snyam du sems so// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las/ de 'ad snyam du 'ad lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
gsum dang/ ma shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i debang po dang/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyad pa

dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ ma rtog mi dpyod pa'i tang nga 'dzan dang/ nang stong pa 'di nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/sang rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma 'dres ba
bco brgyad de/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i phung bo lnga dang/
skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyadadang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas
@# pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gung zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gyi bar te/ de
pa dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yin no// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i
0/ khams dang/ de bzhin du phung po lnga dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhunas//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de dag na 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yan no// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag
la skye ba med pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jag pa med pa dang/ gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa dang/ de bzhin du 'dod chags zad pa dang/ zhe sdang zad pa dang/ gti
mug zad pa drang/ dbanAn du chos gnas pa dang chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid rung/ de bzhin de dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin 'di dang//
gzhan ma yan pa de bzhin tudi dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag na 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o// de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhu na/ 'ad lta sta/ bsam
gtan bzhadang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lta ste/ de dag ni so sor skye bo rnams dang thun mong pa'
chos rnams yin no// de la so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'dzagis
pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag/
na kun mong ma yanapa'i chos rnams zhes bya ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na kun rdzob tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad tha dod par mthong mod kyi/ don dam par mngon par
zhen par ma byed do// ji ltar na mngon par zhen par ma byed ce na/ shAr dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na ma la la zhig gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/
glang po che'i tshogs drung/ rta'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshog sangashagi mthong na/ de la dpung bu myong gi tshogs yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dpar na ma la la tsha bas
gdungs pa zhig gis/ smage rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dba' rlabs 'dra bar g.yo ba mthong na/ 'dra ni chu yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shAr dra tshwa'i 'a de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dpar na ma la la zhig gi rmi lam na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs
dag mthong yang/ sad nas de dag ga gzugs yanin snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ta'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad
par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dpar na ma la la zhige gas chu'i nang na zla ba mthong na/ de rdo la zla ba yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do/ shar
dra da'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par ma byadado// shA ra dwa
ti'i khu dpar na ma la la zhig gas mgo yo mthong na/ de de la dngos por mngon par zhen par ma byed do// Ar dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyang/ chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ma la la zhig rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro'ang/
de la nam mkha' 'o snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la rnam par dpyad na/ chos de
dag thams cad la mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shAr dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen
par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dpar na ma la la zhig gas dra wa ra grong khyer mthong na/ de de la grong khyer yane no snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shAr dwa ti'i
bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ma byed de// shAr dwa ta'i bu dparan ma la la zhag gis me
long gnang du bzhan gyi gzugs brnyan mthong na/ 'du bzhin yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ma byed do// shA ra dwa ta'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong
mod kyi/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen par ma byed do// chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bcu pa las/ chos thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
zhen pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAr tra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzan pa dang 2 sams rnams par rmongs//
pa gang yin pa de na mngon par zhen pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzan pa gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ 'phags pa'i
bdan pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/
dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar par lta ba dang/ bsam
gdan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang/ de bzhin du 'du shes su lta ba dang/ rjes su dran par lta ba dang/ 'du shesakyi
rnam par lta ba dang/ shes par lta ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bo dang/ dbang por lta ba dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched du lta ba dang/ zad par gyi skye mched du lta ba dang/
'gya// stong pa nyid du lta ba dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang/ byams pa
chen po dang/ sang rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du lta ba dang/ de bzhin du pha rol
tu phyin par lta ba dang/ mngon par shes par lta ba dang/ mang du lta ba dang/ mtshan du lta ba dang/ dpe byad bzang por lta ba ste/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de nabyang chub sems dpa' sems
@# dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la
sams rnam par rmongs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ta'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po lnga nas/ rgasha'i bar du
tshu de bzhin du sbyar ba dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzhwa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum nas/ dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdudaban du sbyar ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
tha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag rtag pa 'am/ ma ga pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag yod pa'i m/ bdag mad
pa 'am/ stong pa 'am/ ma stong pa 'om/ mtshan ma yod pa 'am/ mtshan ma med pa 'am/ ston pa yod pa 'am/ smon pa med pa 'am/ zhi ba 'am/ ma
zhib 'am/ dben pa 'am/ mi raben pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am// rnam par byang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ ma skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag
pa med pa 'am/ dngos po med par lta zhung dmags la/ 'dzan rung mtshan mar byed pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ yongs su dpyod par byed pa ste/ de na byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gang ga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dasnyam du/
'di dag na dege ba'i chos rnams so// 'di dag nam dge ba'i chos rnams so/ da deg na lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so// 'dadag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams
so 'ad drug na 'dzabag rten pa'i chos rnams so// 'di reg na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag na theg pa
brgya/ dmad pa'i tshes rnams so// 'ad dag na 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag na 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// 'di reg na thun mong ga tshes rnams so//
'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya bar lta zhang dmags la/ 'dzan cangamtshan mar byed pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ yongs su dpyod par byed na/ shA ra dwa ti'i
bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa' phyir dang/ sems can
mi dmags pa'i phyir dang/ sems can skye ba med pa'i phyi'i dang/ sems can 'gag pa med pa 'a phyir dang/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// de bzhin du srog dang shwa
gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shid las skyes pa dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed pa po 'di dang/ kun nas slong ba po dang/ tshor
ba po dang/ 'tshor bar byed pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dang/ ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang/ skye ba med pa'i phyir dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang/
stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// chos rnams kyang skya ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ stong pa dang/ g.yo ba med pa dang/ gso ba dang/ ya ma brla dang/ bdag po med pa dang/
ba 'byung ba med pa dang/ mabyas pa dang/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang/ byed pa po dang bral ba'o// de ca'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad ltar gzugs de na/ 'di lta ste/ mang tsam mo//
tshar ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ng de bzhin no// rnab dang 'chi ba'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/
zhes bya ba 'di dag ni 'ad lta ste/ mang tsam ma// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag na/
'di lta ste/ mang tsam mo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi par du rad de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po 'di dag na/ 'di lta sta/ mdi tsam mo//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ mang tsam mo// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar
ro shAr dwa ta'i bu mang tsam gang yan pa de de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa 'ga' zhig yod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te yongs su grub par lta nang dmagis la/ 'dzani cing mtshan mar byed/ rtog pa dang/ dpyod par byed na/
de lta ba yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ sams rnam par rmongs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu rnam grangs des na 'ad ltar lta ba yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ sems rnam par rmongs pa gnas ni/ 'ad lta ste/ mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba
'du'i tshig bla dag yin par rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'ad skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs gang gis na/ phung po ldan s de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du mang tsam du bas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'ad lta sta/ phung po lnga zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag na/ 'di lta ste 2 chos su btags pa tsam du zad do// chos su brtags pa de la na skye ba
mad 'gag pa med do// mang gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa khonar zadu la/ phung po'i mang de dag kyang/ nang na'ang mad/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang ma gnas so//
shA ra dwa ta'i bu/ 'ad lta ste/ nang ga skye mched drug ces bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do// chos su btags pa de la na skye ba med/
'gag pa med de/ mngag brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zadra la/ nang skye mched drug ga mang de dag kyang/ nang na'ang mad/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis kA'abar na'ang
ma gnas so// shA ra dwa ta'i bu 1 'di lta ste/ phyi'i skye mched drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag na/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do// chos su btags
pa de la ni skye ba mad/ 'gag pa med de/ mnge ga brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ phyi'i skye mched drug gi mang de dag kyang 2 nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/
