btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dngangs la dngang ra mi
'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato/ shAr nA ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ng ma yani/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu 'ongs ba'ang ma yin na/
skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyad pa gang la spyod na/ byang chub sams dpa'
sems dparachen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ma skrag ma dengang zhing/ dngang bar ma 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams
kyis gzugs ma rtog ces bya bar rnam par so sor rtog sa/ de'ang ma dmugs la/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyas/tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
byad rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma rtag ces bya ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa ste/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu 'dan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shisab kyi la rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// 2ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 1 gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ da 'ang ma dmags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma demags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang
[” ]ma rimags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba bdag mad pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam 'ar so son
rtog ste/ de'ang sa demags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dimagis/ gzugs mtshan m/
med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de 'ang ma demags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang
ma demagis/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam
par so sor rtog sta/ de'ang ma demags/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmags/ de bzhin tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes
ba zhu bar rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmagis/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par soger rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
pangashes pa dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma demagis gzugs rnam par byang ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmigs/ gzugs skye ba med pa'i rnam par so sor rtogasta/ de'ang ma dmagis/ de bzhin du tshor ba/
byargya// dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye ba mad pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags/ gzugs 'gag pa med pa'i rnam par so
za sor rtog lta/ de'ang ma demagis/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa 'a rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma rimagis gzugs
dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'angs demagis/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtogs/
de'ang ma dmags/ shar d+ma ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog cing/ gang gi sems can thams cad la gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma rtag ces bya bas
stong cing/ derang ma dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang ma rimagis pa'i tshul gyis
ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du bdag med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang mi rnamagos pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes
pa'i bar du stong zhes bya bar chos ston cang/ de'ang ma demages pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mtshan ma med ces bya par chos ston cing/ de'ang
ma dma'is pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'ibar du smon pa med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang ma demags pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs
dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du na zhes bya bar chos ston cang/ de 'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la bar du dpon zhes bya bar
chos ston cing/ de'ang ma dmages pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de rangam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston

pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i pher du 'gag pa med ces bya bar chos ston cang/ de'ang ma demages pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du dngos

po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang ma demagis pa' tshul rgyas ston pa de ni/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
na pa la spyod pa'o/ shAr dra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/zhan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
g.yade la byed pa dang bral ba dag gas/gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma rtag ces bya bar yang yid las byed de/ de 'ar ma demages pa'i tshul gyis so//
gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yadi la ma byed de/ de'ang ma rimags pa'i tshul rgyas so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas dang ldan/
pa' pa de la byed pa dang bralab dag gis gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mchan ma mad ces bya ba dang/ smon pa mad ces bya ba dang/ zha zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya

ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skya ba med ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos bo med ces bya ba'i bar du yid la ma byed de/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du

nyan shes dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yadI la byon pa dang ma ldan pa dag gas/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan
ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ zha zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skyab mad ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa medacesabya ba dang/ dngos po med

ces bya bar yade la ma byed cing/ de'ang ma demages pa'i tshul gyis te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi la
rol tu phyin pa la mchog tu 'dzanipa mad pa yin no/[~]shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs
dang tshor ba dang// 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/
mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang/ skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'gag pa
med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa gang yan pa de na/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i ma 'khrug pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// shAr dra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yade la byed pa dag gse/ gzugs la ma rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa de bzhin du//
sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ dbon
dpa' rnam pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang/ skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang
ma demagis pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la ma rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag
med pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang/
skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'gag pa mad pa'i rnam pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis rtog la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang
ldan pa 'a ya di la byed pa' brtson pa ma 'dor ba gang yin pa de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
shA1 zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ta'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs la ma rtog pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/

de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i
rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang/ skya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang ma ngamags
pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la ma reg pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/
stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang/ skye
ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de rang ma des gas pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa dang/ 'an thos dang rang sangs
rgyas dang ldan pa 'a yade la byed pa dag dang/ ma dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa dag gi skabs ma 'byed pa de na/ shAr dwa ti'i
bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// shAr dra ta'i bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'ad ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin te/ gzugs
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
rnam par shes pa stong ra ma yan te/ rnam par shes pa de kyang stong pa 'di do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du mgag stong pa 'ad kyis mgastong pa ma yin te/ mgi 'di

kyang stong pa 'di de// stong pa nyid kyang mag go/ de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi stong pa nad kyis yari stong pa ma yin te/ yidi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yar
de de bzhin du sbyar te/ mag ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin te/ mag ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor bu nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mug gi 'dus te reg pa'i skyen gyis tshor pa'o// dro pazhin du yadi kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshon pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//

de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stongapa nyid kyis dran pa/par gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam nyid kyang stong pa 'di do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/
rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyare kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do// stong pa 'di kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa ma
yan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/

kyi bar bya stong pa 'de kyis sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams stong pa ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi ches rnams so zhes so sor rtog go
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa shAr d+dati'i bus 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang na zab lags de/ thag
pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dang la dngang bar ma 'gyur lags grang/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
@#// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bsnyad pa'i ng ma yani/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i ng ma yin/ dag pa'i rtsa ba mang pos nye bar brtan pa'i ng ma lan/ dge pa'i
bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i ng ma yin/ cachen po la mos pa'i ng ma yani/ lus dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'ang ma yani/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i ng
ma yan na/ de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skyag cung dngang la dngang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'ad ni rig
ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa rnams dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa rnams dang/ chos la ma
pa rnams dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thag par lhung ba'i bsam ba can rnams dang/ brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams dang/ le lo can rnams dang/ srid pa' bde rnga mngon

lhu bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rna lam du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di grag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du gzugs yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang
0 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du yad kyi bar du yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs rnams
yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar du yongs sushes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du mgi ga khams yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du
sbyar te/ yad kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ra 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du mge ga 'dus te reg pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ mig gi 'dus/
da rig par shes pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par
shes pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba'i bar du yongs su shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du/
'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug spang bar 'dod pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang bar 'dod pa dang de bzhin du the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs
mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems spang bar 'dod pa dang gzugasakyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ma rig pa dang/ nga
rgyal dang/ chad pa spang bar 'dod pa dang/ kun tu sbyor ba dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad spang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo na
bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du rdzas bzhi yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyor ba bzhudang/ chu bo bzhi dang/ mdud pa bzhi dang/ phyin ci log bzhi srung bar 'dod pas//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'on la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par sbyang bar 'dod pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i lam yang dag par sgrub par 'dod pa
dung rdzogs par byed 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhu dang/ gzugs/
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa 'khar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom par 'dod pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad kyi pasam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ga
dag yongs su rdzogs pas nam yang ngan song gsum po dag tu ma ltung ba dang/ rigs rama' ba dag tu ma skye ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar ma 'gyur ba'i dag
pa' rtse ba de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod ngas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len la bslab par bya'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bcu pa las/ bslab pa'i
le'u zhes bya ste drug pa rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yongs su zin na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'du shes na ma skag ma dngang zhang dngar bar
ma'agyural/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mang bar myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rag ba'i bshes gzhan gang lags/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i ngu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i deg
ba'i bshes gnyan na/ gang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar ches ston cing/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang//
[©]// rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa d+ham gtogs
par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyisan yongasasu masngo ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/ a dAti'ibu
gzhan yang byang chub saMms dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gtan ni/ gang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
ston pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ngosaston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis ston
la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/ de nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang nubasems pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'ibashes gnyen ni/ gang gzugs bdakamed ces
bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ nizhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ sku ba med ces bya ba dang
'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'angam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams
dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang smon pa mod ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam
par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skye ba med ces bya ba dang 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'angam dmigs pa'i tshulagyis ston la/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 2 3na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sdo bas/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
bshes gnyen yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyenani/ gdamag mi rtag ces bya bar chos
ston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisaston pa dang/ de bzhin du yid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing/de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la// dge ba'i rtsa ba
ji dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog sa par/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyus kyi sar yongs sumasngo bste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes ]
gshen yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gtan na/ gang mig sdug bsngal zhes bya
ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang stong zhes bya ba dang/mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes
bya ba dang/ skya ba medaches bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'angam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ yid kyibar du'ang
sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dad/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pamed ces bya ba dang/ ni zhes bya ba dang/ dban zhes bya ba dang/ rnam
parabyang zhes bya ba dang/ skye ba med ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/ dge ba'i rtsa
ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad ma gtogs par/ nyan bros dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su misdab ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bas
kachen yin no/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgapa'i bshes gtan ni/ gangamig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenakyis tshon bami rtag
ces bya bar chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i bar dus rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshulakyis ston la/ dge ba'i rtsa
ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par/ nyan thos dang 'dasangs rgyas kyisan yongs su mi sdo ba sa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa'
chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dad stong zhes bya ba dad/ mtshan ma med sa bya ba dang/ smon pa med/
ces bya ba dang/ na zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dad/ skye ba med ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa me da ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar
chos ston cing/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi
sngo bsta/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po 'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen yin no/ shAr dwa ti'abu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i dgaba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston par byed pa nas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa nyid kyi chos ston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs
@##// pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa'i phyir dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa'i phyir dad/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/
byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam bsgom pa'i phyir mos ston cid/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisaston pa dang/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med/
pa bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston rung/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston nas/ de bzhin du sbyar/
te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dgabasgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing/de 'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mdun
pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan klos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su masngo ba sta/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyun yin no
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gten ni/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston pa pu8
gang byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/ dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da mgatogs pas/ 1na shos kyis dang rang
sangs rgyas kyis yongs sumi sdo bsta/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
tshe dang ldan par dra ti'athusa'adi skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos
nas skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mi mkhas pa lags shing/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa lags/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa[“]shar dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom zhing/ gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang
dmigs la/ des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyis rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa dad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de dag kyang dmigs la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang
ny+tsa
rlom sems su byed pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mi mkhas pa yin zhing/ sdig
ba'i grogs po 'i lag tu song ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag/
dang bral bas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang gi gzugs stong zhes bya bar yid la byed pa nas/ nang gi gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yin zhes yid la byed
pa dang/ de bzhin du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pastong zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang/ nang gagazugs
de'ang nang stong pa kid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bodisodapa nyid kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa

de'anganang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs par byed cing/ de dag gis kyang rlomasamasasu byed pa dang/ de bzhin dumig nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong ba nyid ces bya bar yid la byed panas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed la/ [！]
stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlomasamasas byed pasta/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mi mkhas pa yin zhing/ sdig pa'i grogs
bo'i lag tu song ba yin no/// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yadabyang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams bsgom zhing/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ de dag gsakyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco
brgyadakyibar dag bsgom zhing/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs la/ de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pasta/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la song
pan thebs mamakhas pas thabs lam mkhas pa yin zhing/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song la/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thosan yang skag cing dbang la dbang bar/
gyur ro// ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa bam po bdun pa/ 'de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa lags shing/ sdig pa'i grogs po gang gis yongs su gzung
bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ skrag cing dadang ladangang bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu la 'daskad cesabaka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogasapon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed/ 'dun
pa zlog par byed cing/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed/ 'dun pa zlog par byed de/ kyi rigs kyi bu 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye pha rolatu phyin pa 'di dkanadi bzhin gshegs/
padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing bshad pa ma yin gyi/ 'di d gnas nyan dngagasa mkhan gyis rang bzon byas pa yin te/ kye 'di dag na mnyan par mi
bya'o// gzung bar mibya/ kun chub par mkhya/ bklagapar mabya/ yid la mi bya/ gzhan dag la'ang bstanapar mi bya'o zhes zer ba gang yin pasko/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di la bdud sdig
can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cig/ byang nubasems pa'i drung du 'ongs nas/ kye rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis khyod las zhig bya/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha
rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya zhes pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar byed pa'i bdud kyis dgam ston cing/ bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogasapor rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'imado sde dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang/ gtan la phab par bstan pha'asde'i bar du ston
par byed/ rab ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dgamirjod maston cing/ yang dag par rtogs
par mi byed ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pon rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs/
rgyas kyi cha byed du bsgyur cing/ byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongasanas/ 'di skad du kye rigasakyi bu khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// khyod lani
byang chub kyi sems kyang med do/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa'i ng ma yin no// khyod ni bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshad rgya bar yang minusaso// zhes
zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dgam rjod miston cid yang dag par rtogs par ma byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangasargyus kyi cha byad du sgyur cid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drud du 'ongasanas/ 'di skad du rigs
kyi bu miganabadagadang bdag gis stong ngo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni bdag dang bdag kasastod ngo// rigs kyi bu de
bzhin du sbyan te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba'i bar nabadag dang bdag gsastod pa nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// de
bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni bdagadang bdag gis stong ngo// de bzhin du dran ba/bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nas/ 'phags/
pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i bar dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum kyi bar nabadag dang bdag gis stong ngo// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sas
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni bdag dad bdagagisastodan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pasakhyod la mi zhig bya
zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de lam rjod ma ston cing yang dag par rtogs par ma byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'o
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bskyar cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du kyi ge
kyibu shar phyogs nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dad/ nyan shos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams med/ nyan thos rnams med da/ shar phyogasal ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyikhams thams cad kyang de bzhin no// zhis
zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod maston cing/ yang dag par rtogs pa ram byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i sdig/
pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan ya nga bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs
nas 8 thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ston te/ de dag rjes su ston pa byed pa'i
dud kyi 'as de lta bu de dag de lam da mi ston cing/ yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'igrogs por rig par bya'o/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang/ slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed/ rnam pa

a/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la byed pa dag dang 'bral bar byed/ dran pa de bar gzhugapa dag dang 'bralaMbar byed panas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar
dag dang 'bral bar byed la/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dad/ smon pa med pa dag la sbyor bar byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ched 'dasad du/ kyi rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos 'di
dag bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer/
ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston cing/ yang dag par rtogs par ma byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang nubasems dang 'a sems dang 'chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
bar bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can mi snang ba'i cha byad du bsgyur cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/
'daskad du rigasakyi bu tshur shog/ gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa bcad pa dang/ rkang pa bcad pa dang/ mgo bcad pa dpag
tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de lo brtson par gyis shig/ gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de
dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing/ yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bugazhan
yang bdud sdig can dge slong gacha byad du bsgyur cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ de la migamartag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cid/ de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya bdang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dad/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ ni
zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skya bamed ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dad/ dngos po yod ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/
de bzhin du ji ltar yig la sbyar ba de bzhin du/ yid kyi bar la'ong rgyacher sbyar bar bya// de bzhin du dran pa ltabar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdagamed ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dad/ ni zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes
ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skyabamed ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos pomod ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyibar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs bcumi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dad/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ zhizhes bya ba dang/
dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang/ skyo bamed ces bya ba dang/ 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngos ston pa'i bdud kyi las de
lta bu de dag ma rdzod mi ston cing/ yang dag par rtogs par ma byed pa de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bu'o/
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a
chen po blabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan n dge ba'ibashes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags shing/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA/
@#// kun nas slong ba po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ tshor bar byed pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba por lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de
zla bzhin du chad pa dang rtag par lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston ba dang/ de bzhin du yod par lta ba dang/ med par lta ba dad phung por lta ba dang/ khamasasulta
ba dang/ sbyamachod du lta ba dang/ bden par lta ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams su lta banas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ibar du ltab spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu lta bskyang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang 2 de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams lachos

ston pa dang/ de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang/ byang chub tu lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor la
bskor bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams lachos ston pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bude ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgaba'i bshes gnyenagyis yongs su zin pa dang/ sdig
pa'i grogs po rnamapar spang ba yin no// kashrar dwa ti'ibu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bdag tu lta baspang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pas//
de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du zhabaspang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa de thamasacad m dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar n
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba'i bar du yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan pashar dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang nugadams dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa thamado cad spang ba'i slad du/ sems can
rnams la chos ston pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sams pa' chen pogazugs su lta bar 'gyur lags/ de bzhin du tshor bar lta ba dang/ 'du
shes su lta ba dang/ 'du byed du lta ba dang/ rnam pa ra zhes par lta ba lags/ de bzhin du mig tu lta ba lags shing/ de bzhin du sbyar tu/ yid kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du gzugs su
lta ba lags shing/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi bar du lta ba lags de bzhin du mig gi khams su lta bar 'gyur banas/ de bzhin dusbyar to/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du lta ba/
byabya 2 lags/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams su lta bar 'gyur banas/ de bzhin du sbyar to/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du dran pa ltabar gzhag par
lta banas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta ba lags shing/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs/
'tshe rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'daskad ces bka' stsal
dod dashA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang shubasems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs dmigasashing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
gzugs su lta ba bsad do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs shing dmigs pa'itshul gyisa rnam par shes par ltababasad do// de bzhin
dumig tu dmigs shid migs pa 'tshulakyis mig tu lta ba bskyod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyiban du dmigs shing dmigs pa 'tshul gyis yad du lta babaskyed do// de bzhin du gzugs rnams sudzamigs/
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyisagazugasa rnams su lta babaskyod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams su lta babaskyed do// de bzhin du mig gi khams
su dmigs shing dmigs pa'itshul gyisamig gi khamasasu lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes
pa'ikhams su lha babaskyed do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khamasasu dmigs shing dmigs pa'itshul gyis gzugs kyikhams su lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du dmag
shad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi khams su lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du dran pa/bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs shing dmigs pa'itshulakyis dran pa nye bar gzhug par lta ba bskyed do// de/
bzhin du sbyar te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du lhab bskyed do// de bzhin du de bzhin
gnyags pa'i stobs bcu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag la lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis de dag la lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dra ti'i bu rgyudan byang chub sems dpa' thabs lami mkhas pa gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du cho' bar lta ba dang/ 'du
bshes su lta ba dang/ 'du byed du lta ba dang/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin dumig tu lta bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyibar du lta bar 'gyur ro//
[o]// de bzhin du gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du sbyar/ chos kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mig gi khams su lta pa/ 2/ de bzhin du
za sbar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khamasasu lta bar 'gyur banas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos ka/ tsa ltabar 'gyur
ro// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur/ sa
stobs bcur lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyibar du lta bar 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems pa'i samasadapa' chen pa thabs l
mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasdod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyisasaMms can rnams la chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang
spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod spobs sam btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spobs lags so// 'o na ji lta bu yin/
gsolapa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems pa'i byang chub kyisamasami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thunamongam lags te//
don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bagyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems khrag pa ma
mchis pa khams gsum dum gtogs pa de na/ de'i rnam pa shAms cad mkhyen pa'i mams zag pamamachis pa khams gsum du mgatogs gang lags pa de la'ang de chags pa mams
pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'isolas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong/
ma yin pa'i[“]mas de gang yin/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nas nye bar bzung// chos gang yang skyob 'am/ 'gag par yang dag pa'i s sume mthong
pa// sta chos gang yang 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar ya ngami 'gyur/ chos gang yang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'ang mamachis la gsaso//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang lami skum 'gag cing/ 'grib pamamachis/ 'phel ba mamachis/ kun nas nyon mongs pam mchis/ rnam par byang ba mamachis/ klo kyi sems
dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems mamachis padon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nad pa 22[“]na pa'i
sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasad kyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'abu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gang smasapa de bzhin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis de la'angasems
pa bcom ldan 'das 'on sems de gzugs la'ang chags pa mamachas lags sem/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam[' ]wA nyes pa la'ang
sems de chags pamamachis lags sam/ de bzhin du mig la'ang sems de chags pamamachis lags sam/ rna ba dang/ sna dngo/lce dang/ lus dang yad+ha kyi bar la
sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du gzugs rnams la'angasams de chags pa mamachis lags sam/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ re dad reg bya dang/ sa
rnams la'ang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du mig gi khams la'angasems de gas pamamachis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnamapar shesapa'i
khams kyi bar la'ang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi bar la'angasems de chags pa mamasalags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te chos kyi khams
kyi bar la'ang sems de chags pamamachis lags sam/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la'adasems de chags pa mamachis lags sam de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang sems de chags pa ma
mchis lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'angasams dechags pam mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
ra dra ti'ibu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs la'ang sems de chags pa midado// de zhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
'bya// par shes pa la'ang sems de chags pa med do// de bzhin du mig lasems de chags pa med panas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar la sems rgyugs pa med
do// de bzhin du gzugs rnams la sems de chags pa med panas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos rnams kyi bar lasems de chags pamed do// de bzhin du mag se9
la/ de chags pamed panas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khamasakyi bar lasems de chags pa med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la sems/ 4khakas pa me da
pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te[） ]chos kyi khams kyi bar lasems de chakas pamed do// de bzhin du dran pa dbar gzhag pa rnams la sems de chaka[N]nga nas/
de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phogs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar lasems de chags pa med pa'i ng de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sogs la sems
ts+tsod rgyugs pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gyi bar lasems de chags pa med pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasakyis 'di skad cesa rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa dkyisams gang yin pa de'ang zapamed cing/
khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin nozhes bka' stsalan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i sku bo thams cad kyisaMms kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du//
zag pa ma mchis shing/ khams gsum du ma kartogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang/ 'dasangs rgyas thams cad ng/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshog
pa rnams kyi thugs de'ang zag pa ma mchis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// shA ra d+hA ti'i bu de de bzhin no// gsol6 ]b.rud
pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyislad du khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ng rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi sladadu zag pa mamachisashing/ khamasagasum du ma gtogs pa las sam/ bka'al pa/ shA 'dri
ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pamamachisashadi khams gsum dum gtogs pa lags sam/ dri
bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyislad du zag pa mamachis shing/ khams kasum dumagags pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA 2d+ma ti'i bu de de'
no/gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi skad du zag pa mamachis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs/
za pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhineno// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'od kyi slad du
zag pa ma mchis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de de bzhinano// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami
gi khams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyislad du zag pa mamachis shing/ khamasagasum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'ibu de de bzhin no//
gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stod pa tid kyi slad du khrag pa ma mchis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA
tswar dwa ti'i bu de de bzhinano// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyibar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyislad du zag pamamachis shing// khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam//
bka' stsal pa/ shAr dra ti'i bu de de bzhinano// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyislad du zag pa ma mchis shing/
khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zug pa ma mchis shing//
khams gsum du ma gtogasapa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ad rang
bzhin gyis stong ba nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar du'ang
rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi sladadu khrag pa mamachis shing/ khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa
de bzhin te/ byis paso so'i skye bo thams cad kyisams kyang rang bzhin gyis stod pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no// de bzhin du kun gros dang
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
panyid kyaphyir/ zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs par ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ng rang bzhin
gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pas yin no// de bzhin du mig kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med
nyid khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/yid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du mig gi khams kya nga brag pa med cid/ khams gsum du gtogs
pam ya na panas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyor ro// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams kyad zag pa med cing/ khams gsum du
gtogs pa ma yin nas chos kyi khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang zag pa med cing/ khams gsum du ka ka
pam yin pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de ba nyenadu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang zag pa med cing/ khams gsum du
gtogs pa ma yin panas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dresapa bsobargyad kyi bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zagapamed cing khams gsum dugags pa
ma yanano// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAnaM dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
ces sems ma yin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chags pa med do zhes bka' stsalan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugasam mchis pa'i ng gzugs ma mchis
ba la chags pa mamachis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du mamachis pa'i ng rnam par shes pa'i bar dumamachis pa lachagasar ma mchis lags sam/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'dasamig mamachis pa'i ng migamamachis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar ma mchisapa'i ng yid ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis
lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kazugs rnams ma mchis pa'i ng gzugasa rnams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du chos rnams ma mchis pa'i
bar dag chos rnams m mchis pa la chagasapa ma mchis lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mgagi khams mamachis pa'i ng mig gi khamasamamachis pa la chags pa ma mchis
lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnamapar shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma mchis pa'i ng yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mamachis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/
de bzhin du dran pa lta bar gzhag pa rnams m mchis pa'i ng dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mamachisapa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags
blabya// pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mamachis pa'i ng 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mamachis pa la chags pa mams lags sam// btsun pa bcom
za ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mamachisapa 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis pa'i ng sangs rgyas kyi chos ma mchis pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smas pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'i ng gzugs med pa la chags pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar/
ba nas/ de bzhin du mig nas/ yid [”]bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du gzugs rnams nas/ chos rnams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du
mig gi khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khamasanas/ chos kyi 'amasakyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar
bo// de bzhin du dran pa lta bar gzhag pa rnams med pa'i ng dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'ilam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//
0/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa'i ng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa la chags pa med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
bar la'ang chags pamed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod panamamanyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sams/ 1nazos
dad rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thunamong nas yin pa'i sems des kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlomasems sumi byed/ mngon par zhen pa'i m byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
bcupa las/ mi dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa rdzogs so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mimakhas pas/ nyan thos kyis ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu lhung zhing/ byang chub
sams pa'i skyonamams pa lam 'jug pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis panagod lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
gyur la/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi san rab tu lhung zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub se mas
dpa'i skyon yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// shAr dra dz+ha'i bu gangag tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po thabs lam mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pan/ thabs la mimakhas pa nyid kyis stong pad kyis stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam
par thar pa'i sgo la brten nas/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du byed cing/ byang chub saMms dpa'i skyon med pa lam 'jug paste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon yin no// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon lags/ bcom
! ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu skyon zhes byabani/'di lta ste/ chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasachos la sred pa'i skyon gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing
kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mi rtagaces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun shes la mngon
par zhen paste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la sad pasaskyon yin no// shA ra dwa ti'ibu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod pan gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon
par zhen pa dang/ gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag med cesabya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/
rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du kazugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma med ces
bya bar gnas par byed cid/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar lasmon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed
cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhan pa dad/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes byabar gnas pa na cing/ kun tu nyis la
mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shis la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du/
gakhrugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par byong zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes/
pa'i bar la skya bamed ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa med ces bya bar
gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shas la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs la dngos pored ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/
rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su
'akun pa'ichos la sred pa ste skyon yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chon po thabs lam mkhas pas sngon nges par ltung zhing/ nyan thos dad rad
sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang mi 'jug pa yin no// shA ra dwati'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa ni thabs lam mkhas pasamag nas/ chos rnams kyi bar la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/
de bzhin du mig nas/ chos rnams kyi bar la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mig nas/ chos rnam
kyi bar labadagamed ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mig nas/ chos rnams kyi bar la stong zhes bya bar gnas par byed
cad kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mag nas/ chos rnams kyi bar lamtshan mamad ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par
zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mi gnas / chos rnams kyi bar lasmon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mi gnas / chos
rnams kyi bar la zhi zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mig nas/ chos rnams kyi bar la dben zhes bya bar gnas par byed cid/
kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du m gnas / chos rnams kyi bar la rnam par byang zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa
dang/ de bzhin du mi gnas / chos rnams kyi bar laskyo bamed ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes lamadon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mig nas/ chos rnams kyi bar la/
'gag pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang/ de bzhin du mig la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing/ kun tu shes la mngon pa/
zhen pa dad chos rnams kyi bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cid/ kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i rjesasu 'thun pa'i chos lasred pa ste skyon zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs lamakhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing/
tan zlos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung ba dad/ byang nubasems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu kazhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs lami mkhas pas/ khams rnams dad/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa d gnas / 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar phung
bo dag gi skabs su sbyar ba bzhin thams cad du rgya cher sbyar bar bya// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs lam mkhas pa sngar nges par ltung
ba yin zhing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyisar rab tu ltung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang mi 'jug pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ma mchis pa gang lags shes gang sbas pa yang/ shAr dra ti'i bu 'di labyang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pas 'di ltar bslab par bya/ chinasagazugs kyis rlomasamasasume bya'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shesaM dad 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pas rlom
sems su mkhya/ mig gis rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du na ba dad/ sna dang/ lce dad/ lus dang/ yid kyis rlom sems su ma bya/ de bzhin du/
dad dridad/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos rnams kyis rnyomasems sumibya/ mig gi khams kyis rlom sems sum bya/ gzugasakyi khamasakyisarlomasems sum cu/
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis zlos somasasum bya/ de bzhin dusbyar to/ yid kyi khams kyibar gyis rlom sems sume/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
[H ]khams kyi bar gyis rlom sems su ma bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems sumabya do bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su ma bya/ de bzhin du bsamaganadang/ tshadamed pa dang/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyisarlom sems sumabya/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis rlom sems sum bya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyadapa'ibaragyisazlom sems sumabya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlomasamasasu bya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
ts+tshA bar gyis rlomasems sum byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lado ltar spyod pas byang chub kyi sems/ mimanyam pa dad
mnyam pa'i sems thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ rgya chen po'i sems de nyidakyis kyang rlom sems sum bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal
ba nyid kyi phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dad ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun/
pa bcom ldan 'das sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba tid gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i busems gang 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ mi ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ ma
ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ gtimug dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ ma ldan pa'i ng ma yin zhing/ de bzhin du kun nas ldang ba rnams dad/ kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang/ bag la
la ba rnams dang/ ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ ma ldan pa 'ang ma yin pa dang/ de bzhin du lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/mi ldan pa'i ng ma yin pa dang/
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dgu dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ ma ldan pa'i ngam yin pa 'din/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'isoms rang bzhin gyis 'od
gas la ba nyid yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das cisanas ma lags pa'i soms gang lags pa de mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems kyi sems/
nyid gang yin pa de la ci yod pa nyid dam/ med pa tid dam/ bdog pa 'am/ mi bdog pa 'am dmigs pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
mamachis lags so// bka' stsal pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal tesams kyisems nyid gang la yod pa nyid dam mad pa nyid med cing mi dmigasan/ gshA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces
snas te/ somasam legs pa'i sems de mchis lags sam/ zhes brgal zhing brtags pa 'di jig rigs sam/ do skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dad ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sams kyi sems nyid de gang lags bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad la
'gyur ba med cing/ rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi sems nyid ces bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsalapa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibus
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasasems de khon 'gyur ba ma mchis shing/ rnam par rtog bamamachis la/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang
'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa de khon 'gyur bamamachis shing/ rnam par rtog pamamachis pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'du byed thams cad kyi bar dag kyang 'gyur
ba mamachis shing/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis lags sam/ de ltar gyuranan byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur bamamachis shing/ rnam par rtog pa mamachis par 'agyur lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te// rang gisams de ltar 'gyur ba med cing ] rnam par rtog pa med pa nas/ 'du byed rngams cad kyi ban dag
dad de bzhin du byang+gachub kyi bar du'ang de la 'gyur ba med cing/ rnam par rtog pa med pa yin te de shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad la 'gyur ba med cing/ rnam par rtog pa med
pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon da pani/ 'di lta ste/ thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no// bzhi gang zhin/ 'dalaphyad
nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par
bsal nas/ nang gi lus lalus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ng maskyed pa dang/ de bzhin du rkun pa shes bzhin/
zla can dran pa dang ldan pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/ yid ma bde ba rnam par basalanas/ phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjesasu lta zhing kanasal
lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ng maskyed pa dang/ de bzhinadu rkun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ mi dmigs pa'itshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/
tshu yid ma bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nad dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ng maskyed pa dang/ de bzhin du rkun pa shes
bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dad/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gyi tshor ba rnams dad/
spyi'i tshor ba rnams dang/ phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ tshor ba la brkon pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ng mi da pa dang/ de bzhin du rten pa shes
bzhin can danapa dang ldan pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dad/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas nang gi sems rnams dad/ phyi'i sems
rnams dang/ phyi nang gsems rnams la sems kyi rjes sulta zhing gnas la sems la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ngayaskyed pa dang/ de bzhin du rkun pa/ shes bzhin can dra ba/
dang ldan pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnabasems dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi chos rnams dad/ phyi'i chos rnams dang/ phyin
gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjesasu lta zhing gnas la/ chos la brtenapa'i rnam par rig pa'i ng miskyed pa'o/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa bam
po brgyad pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje ltar na nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnasashe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po sprodo na'ang bdag spyod par rab tu shesaso// 'greng na'ang bdag 'grang bar rab tu shes so// 'dug na'ang bdag 'dug par rab tu shes so// nyal na'ang/
bdaganyal bar rab tu shes so// de'i lus ji lta ji lta bur gnas par gyur pade lta de lta bur rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun pa
shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjesau lta zhing gnasaso// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
0 bya// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon 'gro 'am/ ldog kyashes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ kun tu lta ba'am/ rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du/
sbyod pa yin/ bskum pa dang/ bkyang ba dang/ snam sbyar dang/ ras yugs chen dang/ lhung bzed thogs pa dang/ zab dang/ 'thung ba dang/ 'cha' ba dang/ myang ba dang/ gad bsad/
bdang ngal bsob dang/ 'od ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dang me la ba dang/ smra ba dang/ mi phana'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang ngab 'jog dad ldan
pana'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/ kashA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa na/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
gnas/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnasaso// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran bzhin du dbugs rngub cing/ dran bzhin
du dbukaMs 'byin te/ des dbugs ring du brngubs na'ang dbugs ring du brngubs padad/ dbugs ring du phyung na'ang dbugs ring du phyung bar rab tu shesaso// dbugs thung du brngubasana'ang
dbugasathud du brngubs par rab tu shisaso// dbugs thung du byung na'ang dbugs thung du phyung bar rab tu shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na T+Tha mkhan nam/ rdzu mkhanagyi slob mamakhas
pas phang lo bskor ba niring du srugs na'ang rang du srubs par rab tu8shasaso// thung du srubs na'ang thung du srubs par rab tu shes so// shar dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po'ang dran bzhin du dbugs rngub cing/ dran bzhin du dbugs 'byin te/ des dbugs ring du bar bsamu'ang dbugs ring du brngubs par 'du shesaso// dbugs ring du
phyung na'ang dbugs ring du phyud kar rab tu shes so// dbugs klung du brngubs pana'ang dbugasu klung du brngubs par rab tushes so// dbugs thung du phyung na'ang dbugs thung du smyung bar rab
tu shes te/ shA 'dra ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rkun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnabasems
dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po ni lus
'di nyid la khams kyis so sor rtog par byed de/ lus 'di lanasa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams yod do snyam du rtog go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ba
glang gsod pa mkhas pa 'am/ bklung gsod pa'i slob ma mkhas pas/ mtshon rnon pos ba klang bsad nas bkabazhir gshags te/ zug bzhir phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste
/su// so sor rtog pa de bzhin du/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la yang/ lus 'di nyid la khams
kyis so sor rtog par byed de/ lus 'di la ni sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams yod dosnyam du rtog ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i
bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa yin te/ de'ang mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis gnasaso// shA ra dwa ti'igazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mabil yan chad/ skra dang mgo man
chad / mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdaste/ lus 'di la ni skadang/ spu dad senamo dang/ pags pa dang/ pags shun dang/ rgyus pa dang/ rus pa dang/
rkang dang/ mkhalam dang/ snying dang/ mcher pa dang/ glo ba dang/ mchin pa dang/ sul mongs dang/ rgyu ma dang// gter ma dang/ kazhang dab/ ltad pa dang/ phusangang mchi ma dang

rdul dang/ tshil dang/ mchilam dang/ snabs dad/ rnag dad/ khrag dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ zhag dang/ chu ser dang/ drim dad/ gcin dang/ klad pa dang/ klad rgyas dgayod do snyam du sosor rtog
ste shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na khyim bdag zhid pa'isrung 'bru'i rnam pasnatshogs 'di ltaste/ til dang/ 'bras 'thug po che dang/ mon sran sdo'u dang/ monasranan ku dang/ nus dad/ gro dang/ sran chung
dang 3'brasasA lu dang/ 'bru dad/ yungs 'bru dag gis gang ba sgo drud gtisasu bzhag pa la mag dad ldan ngasa mthong na/ 'di dkan dil yin no// 'di dagadagan 'bras 3nu
po che yin no// 'di dag ni mon sunasdu'u yin no// 'di dag ni mon sranan ku yin no/ 'di dag ni nas yin no// 'di dgan gro yin no// 'di deganisanachung yin no// 'di dag na 'bras
sA lu yanano// 'di degan 'bru yin no/ 'di dgan yungs kar yin snyam du sems so// shA ra dwa ti'i bude bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la skad
pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang mgo bo man chad ma/tsang ba rnamapasnatshog sakyis gang sta/ lus 'di lan sna dang 6 snga dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ klad pa dang/ klad rgyas kyi bar dag
yod do snyam du so sor rtog go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa'i chen po chun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnabasems dang/ 'dim
bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus l lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas// de'ang mdamigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i skyon med pa yin no// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan pa nga byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa la skyon med pan u0f7a/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhen/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po/ steg pa mi dge ba'angosam skyes pa rnams ma bskyed ba'i phyi'i 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol la/ brtson 'grus rtsom sta/ soms rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab
'jog pa dad/ sdig bam dge ba'i chos skyos pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun paskyod cing rtsol la/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab 'jog pa dad/
dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyi'i 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang/ dge ba'i chos sa
pa rnams gnas pa dang/ mibarjod pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ phyir zhing sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cade 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab
tu'adzin cad yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di nobyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'iskyon med payin no/
shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pan/ 'di ltaste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
khang sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po'i 'dunu pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkad pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/
'gogapa la gnas pa/ rnam par sbyong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang/ de bzhin dus sa kyi ting nge 'dzin srong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa dang/

brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin wong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkad pa bsgom pa dang/ dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la
gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas nig/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam pa nasrong ba'i yongs su bskyar babasgom pa ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
ni byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i skyonamed pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'ibu gzhan yang byang chub sems dapa'i sems dang ' chen po'iskyonamad pani/ 'di ltaste/ dbang po lnga'o/

lnga gang zhe na/'di lta sta/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ dang nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dad/ shes rab kyi dbang po// de'angam dmigs pa'i tshul gyisataM/ shA ra dwa ti'i
bla@#/ dbu de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyonamed pa
ni 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o// lta gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobasaso// de'ang
tshe/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul dut+taM/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i skyonamed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdunano// bdun gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rnam par 'byed
yang ngag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
dad/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lakaste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag de'ang dben pa la gnasapa/ 'dod chags
dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnasapa/ rnam par spong ba'i yongs su bskyar bsgom pa dang/ de bzhin du chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson
'grus dang/ dga' ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dbon pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa lags/
pa rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgomaste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i dzul gyisasgomalo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/
