gshA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub saMms dpa' sems dapa' chen po'i skyon med pani/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 'di ltaste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i

rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i dog dang/ yang dag pa'ilas kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ting ni brgyad pa
yin te/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bugazhan yang byad chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo 'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa shes pa 'dug pas thar pa'i sgo gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chos thams
cad la rnam par ma rtog cingabasamagatan gyibade ba laromang pa med par basam gtan bzhi lasnyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad ma skyo bar bzod pa la 'jug pas tshad med pa
@#// bzhi lasnyoms par 'jug pa dang/ khams gsum dmigasasu med par shes pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
! sems dang/ yid dad/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyon sa par 'jug pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa lags su me da pa'i mthong bas
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lasnyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes dgu lasnyoms par 'jug pa dang/ dran
pa med cing yid labyed pa med pas rjes su dran pa bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes drug lasnyoms par 'jug pa dang shes pa
dang ma shes pa 'chos manyam pasashes pa bcu la 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyisamA tam par kazhan par rtogasanas gsum la snyoms par 'jugapa dang/ dusagasum
dang bral ba'i shes pas dbang po gsum sgom pa dang/ tshul gcig cing tha dad pam byed pa'i shesapa la 'jug pas zil gyisaganon pa'i skye mched rnams sgom pa dang/ chos zab mo la bzod pa
la 'jug pas zad par gyis mched rnams lasnyoms par 'jugapasta/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[/ ]skyon med pa zhes bya'o/// shA ra dwa ti'i bugazhan dang byung drubasems dpa' sems dang 'chen po'i skyon med pa ni gang gatshe/ shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ban/nang stod/

bted la phu stong pa nyid ma mthong/ phyi stong pa nyidal nang stong ba de mi mthong/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid ma mthong/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la nang dang phyi stong pa nyidama mthong/

stod pa dastong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ma mthong/ chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pasod pa nyid mi mthong/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stod pa da ma mthong/ 'dus byas stong pa de//
la 'dus ma byas stong pa dmar thong/ 'dus ma byas stod pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nga ma mthong mtha' las khasapa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang thama med pa stong pa nyid ma/

mthong/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa red ma mthong/ don bamed pastod patid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mthong/ rang bzhinastong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan de stong/
pa ni nga mi mthong/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mthong/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid lam dmigs pastod pa ted me mthong/mi dmigs pa stong pa de

la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mthong/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo di stong pa nyid ma mthong/ ngo bo nyid stod pa dal dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mthong/ dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stod pa tid la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbyod pa ni//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med
pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzhan gyi srid la ma 'go cing gzhan la bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yos su rdzogs par byed de (de'adam
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ bdag dang gzhan la rlom sems med pa la lhag par 'jug nga sa ma 'jigs pa bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
kyis byed pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasasu spang ba'ishes pas/ de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed
da d+ha de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisabyed pa'o// sems can sems can med pas byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/
bdagabadag med pas snying rje chen pos yongasasu rdzogs par byed de/ 'dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o// rig pa gnyis kyi bsam pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad
yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la 'jug pas thams cad shes pa 'de dang/ lam gyi rnam pa
gshes pa de dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o// ser snangang/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang/ khro ba dang/ le lo dang/ rnam
par g.yeng ba'i sems dang/ 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis mas rnams dngos po med par mthong bas/ pha rol phyin pa drug yos su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshulakyis byed pa'o//
chos thams cad 'ong bu dang 'gro ba med ces bya bar mos nas mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisabyed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang//
mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang 'byung ba med ces bya bar mthong nasamaka lta yongs su rdzogs par byed de/
de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'amosanasaMmtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis byed pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shAr dra ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi lam dumachi zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon/
ma mchis pa la'ang 'jug la/ sus kyang thub par rngo ma thogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// shAr dwa ti'i bu gangagatshe byang nubasoms dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shasarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa// gzugs kyiphud por rlomasems su ma byed cing/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du rlomasems su ma byed/ mig gi/
mched du rlomasams su ma byed cing de bzhin du ya dkyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su ma byed/ gzugs kyi su mched du rlom sems su mabyed pas/ chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du/
rlom sems dumabyed/ de bzhin du mig gi khamasas rlomasems dumabyid/gzugs kyi khamasau rlom sems sum byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khamasasu rlomasems sumed pa nas/ de bzhin/
sbyar te/ yid kyi khamasas rlomasams su ma byed/chos kyi khamasakyibar du rlom sems sum byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtsom sems su ma byed pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'i bar du rlom sems sum byid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rlomasems sum byed panas/ shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems sum byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom
sams sume byed/ de bzhin du me 'jigs pa bzhi ded/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rmos/
sems su ma byed/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems su ma byed pa nas/ dgu bcom pa'i bar du rlomasems sumabyed/ de bzhin du rang byang chub la rlom sems su mi

byed/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngurnyomasamasasum byed pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel
ban byang chub kyi lam du 'gro nange/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang 'jug la susakyang thul bar mi nus pa yin no// shAr dra ti'i bu gang na'ar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nias/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yeshes yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// shisapa gang dad ldan n nam yang ngan song rnams su rab tu ma lhung zhing/ mi rnams
kyi nad du nyams pa'i m 'gyur la/ dbul por ma yin pa dang/ lus gang dang ldan na lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par mi 'gyur ba'i lus de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// da
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes pa gang dang ldan na/ nam yang ngan song rnams su mi ltung ba dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par mi 'gyur bar shes pa gang lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klong gi byamasnyad/
dkan/ de bzhin kangashekas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong zhing/ de dag las chos kyad nyan la/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dunayang mthong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ngag kyang mthong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
ba po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas su 'du shesam 'jug/ byang chub sems dpar 'du shesam 'jug/ nyan thosasu 'du shesam 'jug/ 'dasangal rgyas su 'du shesang ma yin/ bdag
ts+tso dushes pa ma yin/ bdagamed par 'dushes pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gyi zhing du 'dushes pa ma yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dad ldan na/ sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod la/ sbyin pa de'adam dmigs pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mdamigs pa dang/ shes pa gang dad
ldan n dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lasngod pa sta shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa gang dang ldan na/ chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ chos de
dgatu'ang rlom sems su ma byed ba'i shes pa yin te/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de lta bsan byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam rnams
spyod par 'dod pa/ byang chub samasadapa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pas/ lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi las dang/ yid kyilas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dag gi skabs dbye bar mi
bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shar pra ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsolato/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi las khanAm tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las gang lags/ yid kyi las gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po gang 'disnyam dusems te/ lus gang gis lus la dmigs
par bya'o snyam pa'i las de 'di yin no snyam pa dang/ de bzhin du ngag de 'di yin no snyam pa dang/ de bzhin du yid de 'di yin no snyam pa dang/ yid gang gis bdag yid la dmigs
par bya'o snyam pa'i yid de 'di yin no snyam paste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu den lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi las dang/ yid kyi las kha nam tho bdang bcasapa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ lus kyang m dmigs pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu galate byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa lus dmigs la/ lus sam/ dag gam/ yid gang gis ser sna'isims dang ra byed cing/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyisems sam/ 'khrug pa'i sems sam/
lo lo'isamasasam/ rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ 'chal pa 'de shes rab kyisoms da na/ shar dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma yin par rig par bya'o//

shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/ yid kyi gnas

thangan len sbyong bar byed na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong zhing/ byang chub sems pa'i skyon med pa
[0/]la yang dag par 'jug pa yin no// de skad cesabaka' stsal pa dang// bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji
ltar n bya da chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po lus kyik+kanas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar na dag dad yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
ba/ shAr dwa ti'i bu gad gatshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ dgadad yod mi demigasashing/ kashA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangasanas gnas la/ nam yang rkan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyisams mi/
spyad cing da sems can thams cad la'ang rtag pa kho nar snyingarje chen po skyed par byed pa// gshA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs
su dag par nga skya'o// de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongasasu dag par ngasma'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu de lta byang chub sems dpa'sems dpa' chen po ba kyapha rol phun pa la spyod pa/
byang chub kyi lamasbyong bar byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyonamed pa la 'jug pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bcu pa las/ skyon med pa'i le'u zhes bya stakhargyad
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasabyang/
rlubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la gnas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug cing/ 'tsho ba'i thig pas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems
tsa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis

sgyu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin par ma byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pan/

nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims ma srung/ bzodapa' bo rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin la/ g shes rab kyi pha/

rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab me sgom gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin par byed panas/ de
bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar laspyod pa na/sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes bsgom par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon/sems can 'di skad cig ni phung po'i
lhagam med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs sumya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'disnyad cig ni mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig na sangs rgyas kyi byad
chub la dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyid cig na dgod par mi bya'o snyam dusems can risasu chad pa rnams kyi donakyi phyir/ go cha chen po gyon par ma byed kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du
go cha chen po gyon par byed cing/ de 'di snyam du'adasems te/ bdag kid kyis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bdag nyid kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyar
bar bya'o snyam cu/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po de tsamakyisanago cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yad byang chub sems dapa'i sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pani/ sbyin pakang sbyin pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin zhing/ de'ang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig thun
mong dubyas nas/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu yongasasusngo ba 'di'i/ shAr dAti'i bu byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa laspyod pa'isbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pan/ thamasacad mkhyen
tid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ de dag nyan thos dang radasangs rgyas kyis yid la ma byed pa sems can thams cad dad thunamong du byas te/ yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byed chub seg

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i'i shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
ba sbyin pan/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed la/chos de dag la bzod ba dang/ 'dod pa dang yid chos

ba 'din bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar gyi/ brtson 'grusakyibartson ba mi gtong zhing ma 'don larab tu'adzinapa/
'din brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// de bzhin du sbyin pa gang sbyin ng na/ sems can thams cad yid la byas nas/nyan thos dang dad sangs rgyas kyi somasakyi goskabs mkhyed
par 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen paskyid dusems rtse gcig pa nyid 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
ba sbyin pa na/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du8shes nye bar gnas shing/ des sbyin par byed pa'i ng mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i ng mi dmigs/ len pa byed pa'i ng ma yin l/ sbyin pa'i ng sbyin bar byed
ba 'dini/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa'i go cha'o// gshA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la mtshan ma ma byed cad/ dmigs par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos ba zhes bya'o// shAr dra/ 'bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa laspyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing de' dasems can thams cad dang thunamod du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'din/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
rgyun// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyisala'ang 'dod pa med pa nyid yin na//
zla so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'dini/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
! sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i chos de dag la bzod pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mngon par yid tshesapa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa'o// shA ra dwati'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin
pa la spyod pa'i chos de dag la brtson pa mi gtong zhing/ mi 'dor ba dang/ rab tu'adzin pa gad yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
pa laspyod pa'i chos de dag la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen potshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa/ thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dad ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems dngamabralabar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi skabs kyang mi 'byengan/ so so'i skyo bo'i
sems dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims gyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo tshulakhrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gangachos thams cad la sbyama'i rnam pa'i 'du shes lta bar gnas shang/ rang bzhin gyi stong pa
nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de la'ang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dapo' sems nga 'a chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis/
yongs su zin pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'isomasakyis sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ de'ang sems can thams cad dang thunamong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdo bste/ snga

ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la'od snyoms ngan
'jug pa la/ de dag ga dbad gis kyang m skye zhing ma 'phrogs pa 'din/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i thabs lamakhas pa dad
ldan pa 'de shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ bsam gtan rnams
dang 1 tshad med pa rnams dad/ gzugs med nga 'isnyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing dban par mthong ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan yamed pa dang/ smon pa med par
mthong ba'i/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang 'jug laM/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon pa 'di yang/ b+hAshA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
rgyu sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shAr drwa 'bu de ltar n pad chub sems dang 'asems
dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa lan shar phyogs nas/ phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'aN+Dig rten
gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye masnyad dgan/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangasu dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhigan/byang chub sems dpa' sems pa 'a chen po 'di

go cha chen po'agos// sems can rnams yongs susmin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ rdzu 'phrulakyis kyang rnamapar 'phrul lo zhes chedadu brjod pached du brjod pa'i mdzad cing/ snyan pa
skyogs la dbyangs brjod par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dad ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'dasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i thegapa chen po gang gis de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhon pa zhes bgyi bdegang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/'dod pa dag las dban la/sdig pa mi dag pa'i chos rnams las dbanapa/
rtog pa dang bcas pa// dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dka'ab dad debacan bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nad yongs su dang
sta sems rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyodapamed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bdo ba can basam gtanaganyis pa bsgrubs gnas pa dad dga' ba'i 'dod
chags dang bral bas/ 'phags pa rnams kyisagang de btang snyoms pa dran pa yosasu dag pa'o zhes brjod pas/ dga' bamed pa/ bde ba la gnas pa bsam gtanagasum
zla pa bslabs te gnas pa dang/ de bde ba'ang sangs te/ ldan s yid bde ba dang yid m bde ba'ang nub pas/ sdug bsngal yang m yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dad/ dran pa yos/
su dgapa bsam gtan bzhi pa 'bar bsgrubs rta gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du byams pa dang ldan pa'i soms yas pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mganyis pa/ tshad med pa/ khon yod pa/ gnod
zla pa med pa// 'gran zla med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig khyab par byas te/ mos nas bsgrubs to gnasapa dang/ de bzhin du gnyis pa dad/ de bzhin
dugasum pa dad/ de bzhin du phyogs bzhi pa dang/ de bzhin du 'og dang/ stong dad/ thad kar thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la byams pa dang ldan pa'
rtswa sems kyisakhyab par byas te/ mos nas bsgrubs te gnas pa de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i somasakyis thams cad du thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la khyab par byas te/ mos pa'i bar du bsgrubasanasa gnas apaste/ tshadayod pa bzhi bsam gtan dang ldan po 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po rab mchog
[j]yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dganyid tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa dang/ rtags dad/ mtshan mdag gis snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/
sems can thums cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'dayang/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang 'a chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dad ldan pa'i sims snying rje chen po ston du 'gro
bas nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dad tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan dag la tshul bzhin du brjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/
rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing/ de dag gi ro myong ba dang/ nyes dmigs dang/ nges par 'byung ba'ang ston pa 'dinaM/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis bsam gtan dang po de dang/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'ibar du gnon cing sgom ste//
bsam gtan de dag la gnas shing/ sems bskyed pa gzhan 'di ltaste/ nyan thos dad rangasangs rgyas kyisoms dgagi skabasam 'byong pa 'din/ shA ra dwa ti'abu pang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[zif ]/ chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
byed pa de dag dang ma bral bar 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi tonamongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad lachos bstan par bya'o snyam nas
tshe de yid la byed pa de dag la bzod pa dad/ 'dod pa dang/ nye bar rtog pa dang/ nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis/ rang gis byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

sems can thams cad dang thunamod du byas nas/ rtag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub yongs su sngo la/ de brtson pa ma gtong zhing ma 'dor bgang yin pa da ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
rgyu chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'obartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag
gsabasamagatan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dag lasnyoms par 'jug cing ldad yang/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyisar yang
[z/]ma ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phun pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis bsam gtan dad/ tshad med pa dad/ gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa na/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/
sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan mamad pa dang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du sosor rtog kyang/ snying rje chen pos yongs su zin
pas nyan thos kyi skyon med pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la'angam 'jug pa 'dan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa ste/ shA
ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ba'adu'ang de bzhin no// rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin/
dad mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
byabya// brgyad kyi bar du bsgom ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yanano// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la snyoms par 'jug cing/ bdag gisasems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o// zhes de dag la phan pa'isims nyid du
'go gtod par byed do// snyid rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing/ de dag la'ang snying brtse ba'i sems nyid du gtod par byed do// dga' ba la'angasnyoms par 'jug cing/ bdag gis sems
can thams cad yongasasu grol bar bya'o// zhes de'angasems can thams cad la gtod par byed do// btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing/ sems can thams cad zag pa zad pan gyur cig
ces bsgom zhing/ de dag la gtod par byed pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams lasdod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang byang chub sems
zla dpa' thomasadapa' chen po gang bsam gtan dad/ tshadamed pa dang/ gzugasamed pa de dag nyid kyi rnam pa dang/ rtags dang/ mtshan ma dag gis stobs par 'jug cing ldad yang/ rnam pa thams cad
waM mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisan yongasasumisdob 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs
med pa lasdodapa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis/ bsam gtan dang//
tshadamed pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag dngam 'dres par gnas te/ sa bcuganyis po de dag dad nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis la 'dod pam skyed kyi/ de
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pa dang/ 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa dag la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis mdage ba'i chos song ba dang/ dge ba'i chos bsgrub pa'i
phyi'i brtson pa ma gtong bar gnas pa den/ byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dad/ tshadayod pa dang/ gzugasamang ba dag la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan de dag nyid dang/ tshadamed pa dang/ gzugasamed pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa de dganyid lasnyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang/
bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang maskye ba 'dini/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang
kya@#// chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas pa'i thabs lamakhas pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
na ba'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ya de la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dad/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i ting nge
'dzin gyisnyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par yang 'jug cing ldangal/ de dag kyang m rtagapa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdagamed pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/
sgamtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin duso sor rtog kyang/ de dag gis nyan thos skyonamed pa ma/ rangasangs rgyas kyi skyon med par ma 'jug pa 'dini/ shAr
dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dad/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugasamed pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa laspyod pa'i thabs lamakhas pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha
la tu phyin pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dgan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las
byung ba'i thabs la mkhas pas yongasasu zin pa'i theg pa chen po yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na de ma dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis nang stong pa nyid shes ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'i ng de bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shug pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad rnam par g.yongasaso snyam pa dang/ mnyam par gzhag go snyam du shes pam 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// shAr dwati'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen pon/ rtagago snyam pa dang/ ma rtag gosnyam du shes pam 'jug pa gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ bde'o snyam pa dang/ sdug bsngal
lo snyam pa dang/ bdag yod do snyam ba dang/ bdag med do snyam du shesapa ma 'jug pa ste/ de'angam dmigs pa'i tshul gyisaso/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba
bam po dgu pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen pon/ 'das pa'i dus lashesapam 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa dang da lta'abyud
ba'i dus la shes pas 'jug la/ dus gsum po de dgam shes pa'i ng ma yin pa ste/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i
chen po'i thogapa chen pon u0f7a/ 'dod pa'i khamasasu shes pam 'jug/ gzugs kyi khamasasu dang/ gzugs med pa'i khamasasu shes pa ma 'jug la/ khams gsum lam shes
ni klu[© ]pa'i ng mi 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ de'ang mi demigs pa'i tshul gyisaso// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig
rten pa'i chos rnams la shis pama'ajug/ 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dad/ 'dus byas rnams dad/ 'dus ma byas rnams dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ zag pa med pa'i/
btsa chos rnams la shes pam 'jug la/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams lam shes pa'i ng mi 'jug/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang/ 'dus byas rnams dang/ 'dus ma byas rnams
lta dang d+ha zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams lam shes pa'i ng ma 'jug cing/ de'angami dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'ibu 'di ni byang chub sem
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la gnas ni/ byang chub sems dapa'i skyonamed pa la 'jug pa'i theg pa yin te/ nyitshiba'i thig pan/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rangasangs
rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ thegapa chen po'ang gzhan la/ go cha chen po'ang gzhan m yin te/ go cha chen po de theg pa chen po yin la/ theg pa
chen podakyang go cha chen po yin pa'i phyir te/ theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang/ go cha chen pogang yin pa den byang chub sems dapa'iskyon med pa yin no/ gdan sabcom ldan 'das/
[zs]]la/ tshe dang ldan pashA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyisan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes
brjod par bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas nas/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyisasbyin pa'i ng ma dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pun pa dang

len pa'i ng mdomags pa dang/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phan
pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas nas/ ma dmigs pa'i tshel gyis dge ba'i chos ma dmigs/ ma dag ba'ices
(dang d+ha lung du ma bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dad/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'ichos
rnams madamigs shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pabasgom pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa pom dmigs te/ shA ra dwa ti'ibu de tsam
[zo]rgya@#// gyisan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnam pa rdams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisems m 'dres bas// bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i ched du dran pa/bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/ de'angami dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
bsgomamo// de bzhin du bsgom pa rnam par gzhag nga 'a chid du yang dag spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ded dbang po lnga dad stobs lnga dang/ bang chub kyi yan lag
hU~M bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadopa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
kyi bar du bsgom ste/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgom pa'i thig pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa
zhes bya'o/ gshAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po 'disnyam du sems pa dmigasasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ]'di ltaste/ byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ mang dang tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'din ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams

kyang dmigasasumed pa'i phyir de bzhin no// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di lta sta/ rnam par shes pa 'diriming dang thasnyad tsam du zad do/ dmagadamigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir//
'di lta ste dmag 'dane ming dang tha snyadatsam du zad do// de bzhin du pAd kyi bar du dmigs su med pa dekyi phyir/ rna ba dang sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni mong
dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// de bzhin du gzugs rnams dmigasasu med pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di lta ste// gzugs rnams zhes bya ba 'di dganaming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// de bzhin
du sgra dad/ dradong/ 'o dad reg bya dang/ chos rnams dmigs su med pa'idakyi phyir/ 'di lta sa/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rnams zhes bya ba
'di dgan mong dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigasasu med pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'ad lta// dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di dag ni mang dang tha snyad tsam
du zad do// de bzhin dusbyar te/ lam gyi bar du dmigs sumed pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag par song ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po lnga dad/ stobs lnga
lnga dang/ bang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ng de bzhin no// 'di ltaste/ nang stong pa nyidaMnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
den dmigasasumed pa nyid kyi phyir/ ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// 'dilta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de dag namenge dang tha snyad tsam du zad panas///
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi banadu dugasasu med pa nyid kyi phyi'i/ 'diltasu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i ban de dganamang dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
du dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang dachos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i matha' zhes bya ba de namang dang tha snyad tsam du zad
dod byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do// 'di lta ste// yang dag par rdzogasapa'is sa rgyas/
zhes bya ba 'din dmigs sumed pa nyid kyi phyir/ mang dang thasnyad tsam du zad dosnyam pa ste/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyisan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posen sa dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyams pa med pa'i mngon par shes
pa la yongasasu rdzogs par byed/ sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhin du 'gro zhing//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las yang dang yang du 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i thig pa rab mchogagi thigapa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang nyan to// theg pa de la zhon te sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir dang/ sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'grog
de'i phyir zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang m 'byung/ sems can gyi 'du shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi'adu shes kyang mi 'byung ngo// yang de gnyis sumed pa'i sa la gnas nias/
lus rjesrid kyis sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa de snyed kyi lus yongs su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
kyi bar du/ nam yang theg pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa[']da rjesasu thob nas/ dge sbyong// bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa ma/
gzhan sus kyang ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyura'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dkan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'tsho zhing
bzhugs pa dang/ de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyithar gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'aklung g.yosnyad dag na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa do dag/ kye 'jig rten gyi khams che gamo zhigan/ byang chub sems/
'a@#// dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gemo zhige theg pa chen po la yang dag pa gzhonanas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjesasu thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su klob
nas da ltar n gzhan dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ gzhan sus kyang ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'jig rten du skor ro// zhes de'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa sgrogs la/
dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ 7/ shar dwa ti'i
bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/ drug gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
drug po de dag go de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang na na/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dad ldan
ba'i sems bskyed pas/ 'di lta ste/ nang ngam phyi'i dngos po dag gi sbyin pa de 'dod pa rnams la sbyin par byed cing/ byin nas kyang sbyin pa desems can thams cad dang thun mong/
du byas nas/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di/ shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la tshul/
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'ibu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod do// bdag kyang dag
babcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangasanas legs par spyod la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i los kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ debad mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa 'din/ nAgAr dra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phan pa naganog med pa'o// de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
gang zhen/ shA rad+dati'ibu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pobadag kyang bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing
'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa 'din/ shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'abazod nga 'i pa rol tu phyin pa'o// de la brtson
'thus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyodas/ pha rol tu phyin/
pa drug la brtson pa ma gtong ba yin/ sems can rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ de'angs dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis byed pa ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhen/ shar tA
tshe ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang thabs lamakhas pas bsam gtan dad/ tshad
med pa dad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan dad/ tshad med pa dad/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag yang dag 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog cing/ chos thams cad la'ang mngon par zhen pamed la/ de'angam dmagasapa'i tshul gyis byed de//

chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pamed pa nas kyang/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sosor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cad 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/
da' dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ shAr dra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sta/ shAr dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshedang ldan pa shAr dra ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci sbyin pa'i/
pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa lags sam/ 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de lta lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa lags shid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ibar du'ang de lta lags nani/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'angs ji ltar n 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa dad/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yos su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du zhin/ 'jig rten pa ni 'dus
byas lags la/ 'dus byas gang lags pa de ni mi rtag pa lags na/ mi rtag pa gang lags pa de ni ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ ci sasbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa lags shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de lta lags nani/ de ni byed pa ma mchis pa lags la/ byed/
pa mamachis pa gang lags pha de na ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rtan pa'i ng yod// 'dzig rten las 'das pa'i ng yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod/
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng 'jig rten pa'i ng yod 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i ng yod do// shAr dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ sbyin nga 'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rtan pa ni gang lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang
lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin yod pa/ sbyin bdag tu gyur pa// de dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang bkren pa dang/
'gron pa dang/ sdug 'apongs dang/ slong ba rnams lazas 'dod pa dag la zas sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin par byed pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gos dad
sngos dang 'phrong 'dang/ byug pa dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ khyim 'dod pa'i bar dag lasbyin par budapa dang/ gnas 'dod pa dag la gnas sbyin par byed cing/ snan/
'dod pa rnams / so bad 'dod rnams la yo byad sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du slong ba rnams lami'i yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du bu sbyin pa
byed pa dang bumo sbyin par byed pa dang rlung ma dang slas kyi 'khor dag sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin dum go dang/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dad/ lce dang/ rkang pa dang/
yan lag dang/ ting log dag sbyin par byed cing/ de dag kyang dngos po'i bdag nyid du gnas shing yongs su gtong bar byed la/ de 'di snyam du'ang sams te/ bdag nasbyin par byed
pa'o/ 3'di dgan len par byed pa'o// kye bda gnas er sna med pa'o// bdag sbyin bdag yin no// bdag ni so Damo ster ba'o/ kye bdagan thoms cad yongasasu gtong ba'o// bdag sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stabyed pa'o// bdagan sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// sbyin pa de byin nas kyang dmigs pa 'tshu sA ra na thams pa thun
nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing/ bdag gisbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cuN+Da nge la bsreg gyur cig cung po'alhagam med pa
las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs sum ngan las 'das par gyur cig snyam mo// de chags pa gsum la chagasashing sbyin pa de sbyin par byed do/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste//
bdag tu 'dushes pa dang/ gzhan du 'du shes pa dang/ sbyin par 'du shes pa sku 1 chags pa gsum po de dag la chags naas sbyin pa de sbyin par byed pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten pa'i sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// deci'i phyi'i 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa zhes bya zhen/ 'doltar 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu spyod cing/ 'jig rten lasam g.yo la yang dag par ma
'dabaste/ rgyudes na 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/
'di u0f7ala kyi byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen posnying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i somasakyis sbyin pa sbyin ng 'angam dmigs/ sbyin pa po'adam dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs/
sbyin pa'i ng ma yin la/ sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'khor gsum yongs dag pa zhes bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang phyad chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ byin nas kyadasemasecan de dag de la gtong yang/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang yang dag par rjes
sum mthong sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon par dga' bamed la/ bran med pa pad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdomod kyi/ mtshan ma phra rab tsam yang dag par rjes su/
ma mthong ba de na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhen/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las
rgal zhing/ 'jig rten las yang dag par 'das te/ den 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gnas pa'i tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pan 'jig rten pa yin la/ ma gnas pan 'jig rten las 'das pa sta/ sbyin nga 'i pha rol tu phyin par jiskadabastan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o// bzod pa'i pa/
rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin dusbyar ro// gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ng yin/
la rta ma gnas pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin dushis 'bakyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yos su rdzogs pa'i byed de/ de'angashAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thug pa chen po dang/ gom chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ pha/
rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya sta dgu pa rdzogasaso/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das ji tsam gyis nago cha chen po bgos pa go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// rab 'byon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi go cha bgos/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gocha bgos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i dopo nyid stod pa nyid kyi bar gyi go
chab gos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gocha bgos/sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi go chab gos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gom bgos/

sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgosanas/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyed dag snang bas

khyab par byed do// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag snang bas khyab par byed do// khyab par byas nasakyad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/ rab tu g.yo bar byed/ kun tu rab tu g.yo bar byed do// de bzhin du shar phyogasanas/ phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klud kyi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/ rab tu g.yo bar byed/ kun tu rab tu g.yo bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snang ba des kyang/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'i go cha bgos panas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bar gyi go cha bgos pa yin no// stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUrlu'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul par byed do/
mngon par sprul nasakyad 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po 'bakod pa mngon par sprul par byed cing/ des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bkod pa mngon pa'i sprulanas kyang/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas
sbyin par byed/ de bzhin du btung banasaM/ gos dang/ 'phreng ba dang spos dang/ byug pa dang/ khang pa dang/ gnaso dang/ mar me dang/ sman dusbyar ba dang/ sman gyi bar du sbyin par byed pa dang

cha dang/ mig yor dang/ sgyum dad/ smig rgyu dang/ sprul pa nam byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'dum byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sprulapade gtan dmigs su med
pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ ma 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid de gtan dmigasasumed pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin

rgyu du sbyar te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar nam byid/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'dum byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gtan
dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byon sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag nim byid/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mabyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas
mngon par 'du ma byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'dultar yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar de gtanadamigasasumed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni mi byed/ ma 'jig/ mngon pa/
'dum byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de gtan dmigasasu med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor rnam grangasades n/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid nam byas/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ mngon
par 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posako cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o
kA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa bam po bcu pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa na mabacingesam grol ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byamasama'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
nga spyi// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yananam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma/

tshe dang ldan par ba 'bya'abu san grol ba yin nam/ smas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin to/gzugasan ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa/
ni ma bcings ma grolabe'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gad pos/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol
zla ba gad yane/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pam bcingasam grol ba gang yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs nam
bcings ma 'grol ba'o// de bzhin du rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang/ rmi lam lta bu'i 'dushes dang/ rmi lam lta bu'i 'du byed rnams dang/ rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par shes pa nam bcingasam
grol ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brag cha lta bu'i gzugs dad/ rmi lam lta bu 'abar ni ma bcades ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du mig yor lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ mag
rgyu lta bu dad/ sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs nimabacings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa nimabacings ma grol ba'o// tshe
dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dad/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/
tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugasan ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i
ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcades ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed
rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa nim bcad sam grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ med pa'i phyi'i gzugasan ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed
rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs thams cad na ma bcings ma grol
ba'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dben pa'i phyir dang/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa thams cad nam bcings ma grol ba'o//
de bzhin du gzugs skye ba med pa'i phyir/ gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams skye bamed pa'i phyir dang/ rnam
@#@#// par shes pa skyo ba med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ gzugs thams cad ni
ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dad/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams 'gag pa me da nga 'i phyir dang/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa'i phyi'o/ rnams par shes pa
thams cad na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gzugs dge ba rnams nam bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dge ba rnams dang/ 'dushes dge ba rnams
dang d+ha 'du byed dge ba rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dge ba rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs ma dag ban ma bcings mgrol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed mi dge ba rnams dad/ rnam pa bshes pami dge ba rnam bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs lung du ma stan panam bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du
rgyu tshor ba dad/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang/ rnamapa shes pa lung dum bstan panim bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'jig rten pa'igazug
ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ 'jig rten pa'i rnams par shes panam bcings ma grol ba'o// de
bzhan du 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gazugasanam bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ 'jig rten/
las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa nim bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa nam bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed rnams
zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs jag pa med pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed zag pa med pa rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzugs med pa'i phyir dang/ tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams med pa'i phyir dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ gzugs mabacings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes
pani ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du dban pa'i phyi'i dang/ gzugs dad/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du skya ba med pa'i phyir dad/ gzugs dang/ rnam
panashes pa'i bar du 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang/ gzugs dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyir/ gzugs dang/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar dum
[@]// bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gad po chos thams cad kyang m bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/
tho ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir dad/ slob med pa'i phyir dad/ 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dad mabacings pa'i phyir dod/ ma grol ba'i phyir/

pa/ chos thams cad na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshadad ldan pa gad po de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phan pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng ma bcingasamakrolapa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na sbyan

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyi'i mabacades ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du med pa'i phyir ma bcingsamagrol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid
kyang m bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'distong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du dran pate ba'agazhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par
spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dad/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dad 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadapa dang/ rnam par thar
pa'isgo gsum dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dad/ de bzhin du phyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phur/
zhen d+ha med pa nyid kyi phyi'i dang/ dbenapa nyid kyi phyir dang/ ma bcings pa de kyi phyir dang/ mgrol ba nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dum bcingasam
grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang mabacings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa de dang byang chub sems dpa' yang m bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ med pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang//

'gags pamed pa nyid kyi phyi'o/ de bzhin du spur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du'adas kacinges ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gad po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin
dum nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dad/ chos dad/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang// chos skyonamed pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dad 'dusam
byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhi na/ 'dusam byas kyi bar du med pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ dab pa de bsgang skye bamed pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang ma
bya/ bcings pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ ma grol ba nyid kyi phyir/ 'dus ma byas kyi bar du ma bcingasam grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ibar dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyibar du mabacasam grol bste/ le'u gong mar ji skad
bstan pa de bon bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tuphun pa'i bar la gnas/
de bzhin du sbyar te/ mabacings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te// ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// ma bcings ma
grol ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// de ma bcad sam grol ba khona'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
'as ma bcingasam grol bde kho na'achos kyang nyan to// ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dadanam yang 'bral bar ma 'gyur ro// mabacings ma grol ba'i mngon par
shes pa rnams dadanam yang 'bral bar m 'gyur ro// mthacings ma grol ba'iyig lta dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcingasam grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar
mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar ma 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par skababo da/ ma bcings ma grol
ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skyed par byed do// ma bcingasam grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// ma bcingasam grol ba'i tshos kyi 'khor lo'ang skor bar
'gyur ro// den pa'i nges ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la sbyor bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcingasam
grolaba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis ]ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ chos thams cad med pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dad/
dben pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ skye bamed pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bu nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma bcings ma
grol ba'i go cha chen po yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byon gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po'i go cha chen pon/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa drug po dag

yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no// drug gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bu ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i miga mngon sum du bu ba shes pa'i mngon par shesapa/
bla spya// dang rta lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ pha rol gyisims kyi rnam par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ sngon
gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bu ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid de/ rab
'byon de dganabyang chub sems dpa' sems dapa'i chen po'a mngon par shes pa drug po ga yanano// 'bo 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba
mngon sum du byab shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongasasu dag par byed pa nyid gang zhen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dang 'asems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/
rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du myong bar byed de/ de sa 'di'ang g.yo bar byed do// de bzhin du gcig tu gyur nas mad por 'gyur ba dad/ mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dad de bzhin du/
snad bar 'gyur zhing/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba'angamyong bar byed do// rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ra la'ang thad kar ma thogs par 'gro ste/ dpar na
nam mkha' labya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la'ang lamo krung bcas nas 'groste/ dperan 'dab chags bya bzhinano// sa la'ang stod du 'byud ba dang byi'u zul byed do dpar na chul bya ba bsano//
chu la'ang minub par 'groste/ dang ra nas la bya ba bzhin no// dub 'thul bar yad byed/ 'bar bar yang byed de/ dparaname'i phung po chen po bzhin no// 'am dad zla bgatis 'di ltar/
rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag la'ang lag pas nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenagyi bar du'ang lus kyi dbad sbyar ro// gang gisarlom/
sems su byed pa dang/ gang la rlom sems su byed pa dad [0f10]gang zhige rlomasems su byed pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis dbon pa[”]da dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs
su med pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul des kyang rlom sems su ma byed pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul de la'ang rlom sems su ma phyid dmags par yang ra byed cing/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang
nyid yade la byed pa ma gtogasapar/ rdzu 'phrulan ngon par sgrub pa'i sems pa'i ngam skyed do// rab 'byon de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'as mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya bshesapa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no// rab 'byor de la phyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po'i
lha'amig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
bya@#// te 8 lha'i mig rnam par dag ba mi'i las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba rnams dad/ skye ba rnams dang/ kha dog bzang po rnams dang/ kha dog nganapa/
rnams dang/ bde 'gro dad/ ngan 'gro dang/ ngan pa dad/ bar ma dang/ gya nom pa'i sems can rnams las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du rab tushes te/ kye ma sems can
'di dag ni lus kyis nyes pa na spyod pa dang ldan pa// dag gis zhes pa' spyod pa dad ldan pa/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta
rgyu/ ba dad ldan pa dag ste/ kye ma de dgan log par lta ba yang dag par bludas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhi gnas ashiso/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du
skyes so// kye ma sems can 'di dgan lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par sbyod pa dad ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dad ldan pa dag yin te/
rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bar dad/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/
soms can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams mthong ba'i bar dang/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'dzag rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'ibar ta/ rab 'byor de na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta'i miga mngon sumadu ba bshes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongasasu dag par byed pa da gang zhen/ rab 'byor 'di labyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lha'i rna bama'i las 'das pa de de 'di lta ste/ lha dang ma'i skan kyang ngo bo de kyis stong pa nyid ka phyesde dang ngo bod kyis dben pa nyid dad 3
ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/ bdag ni nyanato zhes lha'i rlu ba des kyang rlomasems sum byed cade/ rnabasaMshes par bya ba'asgra de'angamidamigs la do rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa da ya de la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir sems kyang skyod pa'i m phyidado/ ra6'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bu ba shes nga 'a mngon ng ro shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa la/ rab 'byor de khyad chubu ras dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha
ral gyisoms kyi rnam par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba sa pa'i mdon par shes pa yongasasu dag par byed pa de gang zhin/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub saMms dang sems pa'i chen po shes rab
bya/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyisems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste//
[】 ]'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tus so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'asims la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems

su yad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas nga'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang
dad bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gamug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'isimasasu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tushes so// gti mug dang
bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral 'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du sred pa dang bcas pa'i sems la sred pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du rab tu shesaso// srid pa dad bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du nye bar lenapa dang bcas pa'i sems dang/ lto par
len pamed pa'i sems dang/ sems bsdus pa dang/ sems rnams par g.yengs pa dang/ sems chung ngu dang/ sems rgya chen por gyur pa dang/ mnyam par pozhag pa'i sems dang/ mnyam par
ma bzhag pa'i sems dang/ sems rnam par grol ba dang/ sems rnam par ma grol ba dang/ bla na yod pa'i sems la glan yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rab tu shes so// bla named par sems/
la blonamed pa'isams su yad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab shes la/ de dag gis rlom sems su'angamasuM/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems de dag ni sems m
san pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar gong du bstan pa de kho na rgya chen sbyar bar bya ste/ rab 'byor Nig chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam par shes pa mngon
sum du bya ba zhes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongasasu dag par byed pa nyid yin no rang 'byor la byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
mngon sum du bu bshes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongasasu dag par byed pa khyod gang zhe na 'ab 'byor 'di la khyad nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas te/ sdon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya pa zhes nga 'i mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub mIl/ des sems gcig kyang rjes su dran panas/ sems brgya'i bar dang/
sems stong gi bar du'ang rjesasu dran no// nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ma brgya'i bar dang/ tAm stod gi yAn dang/ kim 'bum bar du'ang rjes su dran no// zla bgacig kyang rjesasu dran panas/
zla ba brgya'i bar dang/ zla ba stong gi bar dang/ zla ba 'bum gyi bar du'ang rjesasu dran no// lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ lo 'bum gyi bar du'ang rjes su dran no///
bskal pa gcig kyang rjesasu dran panas/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'i b.ro dang/ bskal pa stong phrag ma dang/ bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bumaphrag du ma dag
kyang rjes su dran no// de na bdag gi mngon 'di zhes bya bar gyur/ rusani 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ 2sa ni 'di lta bu zhig za zla/ yun na 'di srid cig gnas gnas/ tshe ni 'di
mu tsam zhig thub/ tshe ring khyad ni 'di tsam zhig lon/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myod/ de de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'di'i skyes
so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang/ sems can gzhan dag dad/ gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma dag rjes su dran la/ mngon par
shes pa des kyang rlom sems sum byed pa'i bar duste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon sumadu bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs
pho su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya'o/ rab 'byorade labyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa zad pa mngon sumadu bya ba shes pa'i mngon pa'i shes pa yongs su dag par byed
pa nyid gang zhen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la gnasata zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa mngon par
bsgrubs kyang/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyisa'ang rjesasu thob par ma byed la/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
chosogad la'ang 'dod pa'i m byed cing de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lcabu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas/ bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed mod kyi/ do bo de
kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang ngo bo de kyis dmigasasumed pa ted kyi phyir dang/ zag pa zad pa mngon sum du ba bshes pa'i mngon par shes pa des
kyang rlom sems sum byed la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems kyang skyod pa'i m byed de/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa zad
pa mngon sum du bu ba shesapa yodasasu dag par byed pa red yin no// rab 'byon de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tuphan pa la gnang pa'i mngon par shes pa drug po
dag yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya ste// de'ang go cha chen po yin par rig par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ mngon par shes pa'i le'u zhes bya stabcu pa/
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go m chen pon/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga ste/ lnga po
gad zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang/ lha'i mig dang/ shes rab kyi mig dang/ chos kyimagatad/ sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'amag yongs su dag pa gad lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'amig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba'ad yod do// byed chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gad sha' re ga gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba'ang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mgags dang ga tshad sum brgyum thodaba'ang yod do// byang chung sems dpa' sem
[¥/ ]dpa' chen po gdasha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhibargya dang/ lnga brgya dang/ drug brgyar mthong ba'ang yod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangasha'amog gis 'dzam bu'i gling
kaciga mthong ba'ang yod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogangasha'amog gis klong gsa mthong banas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sha'amig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rtenagyi khams
kyi bar du mthong ba'ang yod do// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po gangasha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rtenagyi khams mthong ba'ang yod do/ yad rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po gangasha'amigagis stong gnyis pabar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khamasa mthong ba'ang yod do// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis
stod gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'ang yod do// rab 'byor de ni byang chu sems dpa' chen po'i u0f7asha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyal chen
bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de thams cad ni/ byang rlub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rab tu shes so// de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dad/
'thababral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lu rnams nas/ 'ogamin gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gad yani
pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rab tu shes la/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ chen po'i byA 'amag gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
kyis rab tu mi shes pa nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shesaso// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dang bsems dang 'chen po'i lha'i mig gis/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams 'chi 'apo dang skye ba dag kyang mthong/
