kha dog bzud po rnams dang/ kha dog ngan pa rnams dad/ bde 'gro dang/ ngan 'grodang/ ngan pa dang bar ma dang/ gya nom pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag
ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dad ldan pa/ ngag gi nyes par sbyod pa dad ldan pa/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dang ldan
pa dag yin te/ kye ma 'di dag na log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhigaste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log nga ra khyung bsoms can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/
kyi ma sems can 'di dagan lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa// ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa ste zhes bya banas/ rgyu dang rkyen de'i bar du//
lus zhig nas bde gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye masnyed kyabar dkan/ sems
can dag las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin zhes bya ba nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba bar du mgyongasA sAn 'byor de nubyang rlubasems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mag yongasasu dag pa de
gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen ngo 'a shes rab kyi mig gang gis 'disnyam du gad 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/
'jig rtenapa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pamed pa'i chos gad yad yod desnyam du ma sems pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
shes rab kyi mig gang gis gangam mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ medran pa 'am/ rnam par mngashos pa'i chos gang yang med de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
kyi mig yongasasu dag pa yin no/ gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dapa'i sems dpa' chen po'ichos kyi mig gis 'di ltar shes te gang zag 'din dad pas rjes su'abrang ba'o// 'dinachos kyi rjes su
'brang ba'o// 'di nistong pa nyid la gnas pa'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa'o// 'dinasmon pa med pa la gnas pa'o// gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam
par thar pa'ispos dbang po lnga po dag skyed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam
par grol ba'i yishes skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grolapa'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di ltaste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/
the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod/
chags pa dang/ gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/ de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dad gnod
sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro// des de gnyis spangs pasaphyir mi 'ong ba yin no// des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgom pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang 'thun nga 'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga
spong bar 'gyur te/ lngagang zhe na/'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dad/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ma rig pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod pa ste/ des de dgaspangs pas dgrabcom

0 par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dad/ gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lngapo dgaskyed par 'gyur ro// de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg
par 'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting dzin las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa spyad par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dgaspong bar 'gyur te
gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dad/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas
rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dang/ gnod sems gsasrab mor byed par 'gyur te/ donas lan cig phyir 'od ba yin no//
des bsgom pa'i lam chen bsoms de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dang/ gnodasems gsam lus par spong bar 'gyur ro// des na gsasngangs pas phyir ma 'od ba yin no// des bsgom pa'i
lamacherab sgoms pas de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga podag spong bar 'gyur te/ lngagang zhen/ 'di lta ste// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod/
chags dad/ ma rig pa dad/ da rgyal dang/ rgod pa ste/ des de dag spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dad/ gang zag 'di nasmon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i
byung// sgos dbad po lnga po dag skyed par 'gyur ro// de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i tid nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting de 'dzin las rnam
par grol ba'ishes pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grol ba'ishesapa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/
the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa sta/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag sngangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod chags dad/
gnod sems srab mor byed par 'gyur te/ den lan cig phyi'i 'od ba yin no// des bsgom pa'i lamacher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dad/ gnod sems de gnyis ka ma lus par
srodabar 'gyur ro// des de gnyis ka spangs pas phyiram 'od ba yin no// des bsgom pa'i lamar bsgoms pa nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dad 'thun pa 'a kun tu sbyor ba lnga po dag srong bar 'gyur te/ ldagang
zhen 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dad/ gzugasamed pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ma rig pa dang/ da rgyal dang/ rgod pa ste// des de dag spangs pas dgrabcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya bste/
rab 'byoradenabyad chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyimig yongs su dag pa yin no/ rab 'byoragazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi 'ad ltar shes te/kun 'byung ba'i/

[a]chos gang ci'ang rung ba de thams cad ni 'gog pa'ichos yin par rig nas/ dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga thob ste/ rab 'byor de nubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshes kyimag yongs su dag/
pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gAtshe 'di ltar shes te/'din sims dngapobaskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/ sbyano

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'ibar la sbyod pa'o zhes bya ba dang de nas dad pa'idabang po dad/ brtson 'grusakyi dbang po thabs la
mkhas pa dad ldan pas rtag tu lus bzang po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lte bar rton pas brten pa ste/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta

bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gnad du skye ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skyo bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen/
bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyin ng du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/ der gnas nas kyang
sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed cing bde ba nye bar sgrub pa thams cad kyisasimasacan rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ de bzhin
[5 ]@#// gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par byed/ bkur stir byed/ blamar byed/ ri mo'abyed de/ mchod par byed/ nyan thos kyis/
'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyasar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'din bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phu'i ldog par mi
'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes taM/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang nubasems dapa'i sems dpa' chen
lta pos 'di ltar shesate/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhinagshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// 'di ni lad mabastanAto// byang chub sems
dpa' 'di dag ni rang gi don byed par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni byed par ma 'gyur ro// byang nubawems dpa' 'di dag naphyir ldog pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o// byang chub
sems dpa' 'di'i mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs so// 'di ni yongs su ma rdzogs so// byang chub sems dpa' 'dani mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag gis sha' phyogs
kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dad/ bkur stir bya ba'i phyir
dang/ bla mar bya ba'i phyir dad rimor bya ba'i phyir dang/ mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon pa shes pa thob bo// 'di ni thob par ma 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dpa' 'di ni byang chub thob pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i m 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems can
rnams yongs su smin par byas so// 'disan smin pa ma byas so// byang chub sems dang 'a 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byi masnyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams bsdugs pa brjod par mdzad do// 'di lan brjod par ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dagunas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas so/
gnas par 'gyur ro// 'dinati bar ma gnas so// nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur 'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub ba pa'i tshe nadepag tu yod par 'gyur ro byang chub sems dang 'a 'di/
byang chub thob pa'i tshe na dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'dabyang chub thob pa'idage slong gi dge 'dunan dang gtu yodapar 'gyur ro// 'di'i ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// byang
nubasems dpa' 'di ni byang chub thob pa'i tsho byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// 'di'i no dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dapa'i 'adini dka' ba spyod par 'gyur
ro// 'di ni spyod pa'i m 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'dunibyang chub kyi/
snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par ma 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lan bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar shes pasdu/ rab 'byor de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan par ba 'byor gyas
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyad chubusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongasasu dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'astsalapa/ rab 'byor

byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogasasu/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de rjes su thob la/ de'ang de bzhin

( gshags pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan/ so so yang dag par 'ag pa bzhi dang 'byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad dang ldan zhing/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'isangs rgyas kyi mige gang gis rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad lam mgyong ba dang/ mos pa'i m/ mi dran pa 'om/ mngon nga'amanyes pa gang yang med pasU/ rab 'byor don/
00bud chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs panasas rgyas pa'i mig lnga po yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byad/
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kya shin tu yongasasu dag pa'i mig ldapo dag yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig lnga po de dag yongs su dag par
byed pan kon chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang gnas pa'i m bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gnas dang/ gnas pa po dang/ gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i
phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bdagagis bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa'i don 'tshalab ltar na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags
so tade bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la gnasapar mi bgyi lags so// mig la gnas par mabagyi lags/
so 8 3de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dad/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags
so 3de bzhin du sgra dang/ dridang/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos rnams la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi banas/ yid
kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas pa'i m brgya lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par ma bgyi lags so/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par ma bgyi
lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshon ba la gnas par ma bgyi panas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatsho ba'i bar la gnas pa 'ami bgyi zhang/ sa'i khamasakyi bar la gnas
param gyi/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khamasadang/ rlung gi khams la gnas pa'i m bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i m bgyi/ rnam par shes nga 'i khams la gnas par ma bgyi/ ma rig pa/
la gnas par ma bgyi ba nas/ rga shi'i bar la gnas ngor mabagyi lags so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasagazugasanagazugs kyis stong/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du/
shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pan rnam par shes pas stod ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stod pad gang lags pa de gzugs lags la/gzugs kyi
stod pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugasamamachas te/ gzugs nyid kyang stod pa dad lags/ stong pa nyid kyad gzugs lags pa'i slad du sdu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnamagrangs des na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba'i stod pa dad gang lags pa dang/ 'du
shes kyi stong pa nyid kad lags pa dad/ 'du byed kyi stod pa dgang lags pa dang/ rnam par shis pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa'i
stod pa nyid las dma'ang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stod pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grus
des n/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pas/ tshor ba la gnas pa'i m brgyabanas/ rnamapar shes pa'ibar la gnas par bgyi lags so// de/
bzhin du sur te/ ma rig pa la gnas pa'i mabagyi ba nas/ rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar shi'i bar gyistong pa nyid gang lags pa de gsham
bu@#/ 1lags la/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid las gung na'ang rga sha ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang sgra sha lags pa'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'dus rnam grangs des n/ byang nubasems dpa' rems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rga shi'i bar la gnas par mabagyi lags so/ ba/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasbyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ dran pa bar gzhag pa rnams las kung na'ang stong pa de ma mchis la/ stod pa de
lasakud na'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mamachis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa de lags la/stod pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o//
de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyadan sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pabaco brgyad las udana'ang stong pa demamachis la/ stod pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco
brgyad ma mchis te// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bcobargyad lags pa'i slad du 'o// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das rnam gras des n/ byang chub soms pa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolaMtu phyin pa laspyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par ma bgyi
lags so/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khru pa bam po bcu gcig pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas panamabagyi lags so// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phan pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i m bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di

ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ibar ni shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasaudana'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de kyang

stod pa dad lags la stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du sku/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnamagradas des n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolatu
phyin pa lasprodapas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mibagyi lags so//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasagazhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yig 'bru rnams la gnas par mi bgyi/ yi ge bsgrub pa
la gnas par ma bgyi gcig brjod pa dang/ gas brjod pa dang/ mad po brjod pa'i bar dag la gnas pa'i m thegyi lags so// 'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig 'bru rnams Mkyis
stod pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ le'u gongamar ji skad bstan pa de khon bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni
mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa gang lags pa de ni stong pa dam lags/stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mngon par shes pa ma lags shing/ mngon par shes pa
rnams las gudana'ang stod pa nyid ma mchis la/stod pa nyid las gud na'anga mngon par shesapa rnams mamachis te/ mngon par shes pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon
par shes pa rnams lags pa'i sladadu sku/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnamagrangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon
par shes pa rnams la gnas par ma bgyilags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasagazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
srod pas/ gzugs ma rtog ces bgyi bar gnas pa'i m bgyi lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnamapar shes pami rtag ces bgyi bdagan
par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar gzugasam rtag pa nyid ma rtag pasastong ste/ gzugasam rtag pa nyid gang lags pa de stod pa'idam legs/ stong pa nyid gang lags
pade'ang gzugs rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugasami rtag pa nyid las gungana'ang stong pa nyidamamachis la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs ma rtog pa dmamachis te/ gzugasam
rtagapa da kyang stod pa 'di lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyidi lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa dag la'ang rgya
chen sbyar bar bgyi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangasades na/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pan pa laspyod pas/gzugs mi rtag pa de nas/ rnam par
klu/ shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de bzhin du spyar te/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i ben la bde zhes bgyi bor gnas par mi bgyi lags
so/ rtagazugasanas rnam par shes pa'i ber la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi lags// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stod zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags
sod dgazugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar lamtshan ma mamachis zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bon la smon pam mchis zhes bgyibar
gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bon la zhi zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bon la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas
par ma bgyi lags so// gzugs nasa rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi bar gnas pa'i m bgyi lags so// gzugasanas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skya ba ma mchis
zhes bgyi bar gnas dar ma bgyi lags so// gzugasanas rnam par shes pa'i por la 'gag mamachis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i
ban la dngos po mams zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gzugs kyi phung por jiskad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yad byang nubasems pa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyade bzhin nyid la gnas par ma bgyi lags so//
de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid nachos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las udana'ang stong pa kid ma mchis la/ stod pa nyid las ud na'ang chos kyi
bzhin nyidamamanyis te/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa da lags la/ stod pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin da lags pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi de bzhin de la gnasepar mi bgyi banas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos de
dad/ chos kyi dbyed s dang/ chos skyon med pa 'di dad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par m bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ snga mji lta ba bzhin dusun bar 'gyiba'i slad du'o/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngas/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dad/ tid ngo 'dzin
gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar gzungs kyisgo rnams dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ting nge
'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ sngam bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la ma
za mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pani/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gi bar 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yid kyis gzugs laspyod cid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dad/
wi 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la sbyong na/ de ltar gzugasa mngon par 'du bgyi ba laspyod pa lags shang/ de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba dad 'du
shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags te/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod panange shes rab kyi pha rol
tuphun pa yongasasum 'dzin cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyi bam lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pad du sa
par 'byud bar ma 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ thabs la mamakhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dad
bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la spyod pa de ltar na/ gzugs mngon par 'du
bgyi ba la spyod pa lags shing/ de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang/ 'du shesa mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang/ rnam par shes pa mngon par
'du bgyig la stod pa lags shing/ mngon par 'du bgyib la sdod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin ng la rnal 'byor du bgyid
pam lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pad du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasaM//
'di lta sta/ byang chub sen sa dang 'ashesa'ab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs lamamakhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gir 'dzin pa'i yid kyis de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar laspyod pani/ gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags te/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba laspyod pa ni shes rab kyi/
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byon dubgyid pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs sum rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar ma 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhenaM/ 'di ltar gzugs ni yongasasu bzung ba ma mchis/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed/
rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni yongasasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'islad du'o// gzugs kyi bzung ba ma mchis pa de nirang bzhin gyisasod pa'i nyid kyi slad du
gzugs ma lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang/ 'du shes gang la gsapa dang/ 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang/ rnam par shes pa yongasasu ma bzung
'khaM gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stod pa rgod kyi slad du rnam par ngashis pa ma la gsaso// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gozungs kyi sgo rnams dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni yongs su
bzud ba ma mchis lags so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du/
gzungs kyi rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags so/ dga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis lags so//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par nye bar brtag par bgyi// ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam
par 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po'i yongs su bzung bamamachis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yang sapa tshad mams pa/

0 tshad ma nges pa des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thunamod ma lags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyidakyi slad du dang/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang/ de bzhin/

du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang/ stod pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dad/ chen po stod pa nyid dang/ don dam pasod panyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stod pa nyid dad/

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang thama med pastod panyid dang/ dor bamed pa stod pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stod pa/
nyid dad/ ma dmigs pa stod pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa de dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i do bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongasasu bzung ba mamachis pa lags/
so 3de ci'i slad du zhen/ de ni mtshan ms bsgrub par bgyib ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ mtshan mani nyon mongs pa'i slad du'o// mtshan ma'ang gang lags she na/ 'di
lta ste/ gzugs nimtshan ma lags so// sgra dad/ dridang/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos ni mtshan ma lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// de
nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar du mtshan ma lags te/ de ni mtshan ma zhes bgyi'o// nyon mongs pa'i ng de lags te/ de ni gzung bar ma bgyi/ goms par mi bgyi lags so// de ltar
0 @#// ma lags nana kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di ladad par ma 'gyur lags so// dad pa de'ang gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa//
'di la yid ches pa dang/ rtogs pa dad/ mos pa dang/ rten pa dang/ sems pa dang/ 'aN+Dalam dang/ spyod pa ste/ de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags te/ de ltar na mtshan ma de gzung bag
'tsha ma bgyi lags so// kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang mos nasadad pas rjes su 'brang zhing/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa redu shes pas zhugs nas gozugs su ma bzung/ tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mtshan man yongs su ma bzung logs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stod pa'i chos rnams
yongs su bzung bam skyo ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar des shes bde nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas yang dag par rjesasu ma mthong/ phyi'i mngon par rtogs pa thob
pa dang/ phyi nang gA mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shesapa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/ nang stong pa de kyi slad du shes pa de shes pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa las gzhan du yang dag
par rjesasum mthodaba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar ngos gang gis shes par bgyid pa dang/ gang shes par bgyid pa dang/ gang las shes par bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par
[j]rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs nas/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong shes pa de gzugs
nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su mamod/ shes pa de gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyin ng dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjesasuma mthong/ gzugs
las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjesasuma mthong/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams las gzhan du yang dag par rjesasum mthong/ shes pa de rnam par shes pa lasagazhan
du yang dag par rjesasuma mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzosbyang sayos par gyur te de chos 'di la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad pas rjes su 'brang par gyur
to/ de lta bas na chos thams cad mdamags pa'i slad du chos de tshadam bgyis te/mtshan ma yade lamabgyid pas/ ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongasasu bzung ba mamachis pa de ltar
des mos lags so// chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ngos gang gzung bar bgyi ba'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yadam dmigs te/ chos thams cad rlom
sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mya ngan las 'dasapas kyang rlom sems su mibagyi lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasachos thams cad yongasasu bzung ba mamachis pa'i slad du/ gdagazugs
yodas su ma 'dzin cid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dad/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dad/ de bzhin du sbyar te chos thams
cad yongasasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzudasakyi sgo thams cad dang ting de 'dzin kyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yosasu mi 'dzin pa ni pha rolanas pha rol tu mchas bam mchis pa'i slad du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang rlom sems sumabgyid pa lags so// de ni dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ do
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs pa 'bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' 'gas so// de ci'i slad du
zhe na rta'adi ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag dran pa bar gzhagapam lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong banas/de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad kyi bar dag
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags par yang dag par rjesasu mthong ba'i slad du// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshonapo'i kang gzugs sum 'dzin pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa yodas sum 'dzin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ tide de 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyibar du yongs sum 'dzin pa dang/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ibar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
bar dag yosasu mi 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasagazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bgyiso/ kya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gis na/ 'da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ 'di gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/
de ci'i phyir zhen/ g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gzugs brtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ yang 'di snyam du chos
gang med cing midamigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa 'osnyam du nges par sems par bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad

ces snyas so// tshe dad ldan pa rab 'byor chos med cing mi dmags pa gang yin/ smras pa/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ stong pa nyid

stong pa de kyi phyir dang/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ don dam pa stong pa'i d kyi phyir dang/ 'dus byas stod pad kyi phyir dang/ 'dus ma byas stod pad kyi phyir dang/ mtha' las 'dasapastod pa
nyid kyi phyir dang/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ dor bamed pa stong pa nyidakyi phyir dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi

phyir dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ ngo bo nyid stong pa kid kyi phyir dang/ dngos po med pa'i do

bo de sod pa 'ad kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos na me da cing ma dmigs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dad//

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'ibu de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
med cing ma dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stod pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs
med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa med de ma dmigasaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

bunang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigasaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyibar du med cing mdamigs so// tshe dang ldan pashAr h+phati'i bu
[4]dran pate bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pabaco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa drugamed cing mdamigasaso// de bzhin skyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA
dwa ti'i bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kanas pa ded dang/ chos skyonamed pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i matha'abar du med cing mi dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa
med cing ma dmigs pa sa/ dgra bcomapa'i bar du med cing ma dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigasaso// tshe dad ldan pa/

shA ra dwa ti'i busangs rgyas zhes byabamed cing ma dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mdamigasaso// tshe dad ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod panA/ de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing ngesapanasems par byed la/ de ltar tu ban rtog par byed cing de ltar nges par sems pan
gal tesems m zhum mi 'gong la/ mi skragamedadang zhade/ dngad bar m 'gyuran/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mabralabar rigapar bya'o/
denas tshe dang ldan pa shAr drati'i bus/ tshodad ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smasaso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyiran/ byad chub sems dba'asems pa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa dang ma bralab rig par bya/de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shAr rdo/
wa 'i bu gzugasan gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa na yang dgapa ji lta ba bzhin du rab shesaso//

tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshon ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shesapa'i rang bzhin dang bral bsto/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pan yid dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhinadu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phan pa

dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phan pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dad
thal bste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// de bzhin du sbyar taM/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang/ yad

[6/]dag pa'i matha'i bar nayang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang// tshe dang ldan pa shA
ra dra ti'abus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'driskad cesasmras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoragazugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin/ tshor bdad/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin

gang yani/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te[） ]yad dag pa'i mtha'abar gyi rang bzhin gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dad ldan pa rab 'byor

gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshadad ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi 'ad bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du tshon bad/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/

rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du rang bzhinani dngos pomed pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des n 'di ltar rig par
bya ste ji ltar gzugasanagazugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad 2 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pani rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bralabanas/
zlaspya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar na yang dag pa'i matha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba de yin la/ mtshan nyid kyang rang bzhin gyis bral ba yin la/ rang bzhin yod//
mtshan nyid dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' samasadapa'i chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ma/sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bu de de bzhinano// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thamasacad nam skyes shesanges par 'byung bamed pa'i phyir ro/ dpas nga/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon ci'i phyir chos thams cad skyes shing a par 'byung bamed ba

yin d+ha smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ishu gzugs ni gAzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la ni skye ba'ang med cing 'byung ba'ang dmigasasu med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushos dad/

'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pani rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de lani skye ba'angamed ched 'byung ba'ang dmigs su med do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar na yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang
bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la niskyo ba'ang med cing 'byung ba'ang dmigasasu med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ mi gnas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//
donas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon gyis 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs lamamakhas pas gzugs la spyod pa de nimtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dad/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa
laspyod pa de nimtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// yang gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba dang/ ma rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shesapa la rtag ces bgyi ba dang/ martag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te gzugs la bde
zhes bgyi ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba'aspyodan/ de namtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang/ 'dushos dad/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la bde zhes
bgyi ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba'aspyod na/ denAmtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la bdagamachis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ bdagam mams bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma
(la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dad/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la bdagamachis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma
mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// gzugs la stong zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bgyi bar sngodan/ de ni mtshan ma laspyod pa lags so//
tshe gal te de bzhin du tshor ba dad/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de na mtshan ma 'a sprod pa lags so//
gal te gzugs lamtshan mamachis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mtshan ma mamachis zhes bgyi bar sngod// de nimtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shos dad/ 'du byed
rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mtshan ma mams zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de nimtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la snon pa mchis zhes
bgyi ba 'am/ smon pam mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de namtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la son pamachis
zhes bgyi ba 'am/ smon pamamachis zhes bgyi bar spyodan/ denAmtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal gaphrugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma
laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la ni zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma'i zhes bgyi bar ljongan/ demtshan ma la spyod pa lags so///
gal te gzugs la dbenazhes bgyi ba 'am mdaben zhes bgyi bar spyodan/ da ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
bar shes pa la dpen zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dpon zhes bgyi ba' sbyodan/ de ni mtshan ma la sbyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/ rnam par byang
zhes bgyibar sbyong n/ de ni mtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal tatshor ba dang 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/
rnam par byang zhes bkyi bar spyodan/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa 'gasaso// gal te gzugs la skye zhes bgyib 'am maskye zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de
bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang/ 'dushesadad/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shesapa laskye zhes bgyib 'am/ ma skya zhes bgyi ba spyod na/ de nemtshan ma la sbyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la
'gag ces bgyib 'am/ mi 'gag ces bgyi bar spyodan/ de ni mtshan ma laspyod pa lags so// de bzhin du kal tatshon ba dad/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa la 'gag ces bgyi ba
'am d+ha mi 'gag ces bgyi bar rtsod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po mamachis zhes bagyi
ba' sdod na/ de ni mtshan ma la stod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la dngos pomachis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po ma
mchis zhes bgyi bar stodan/ de namtshan ma la sdod pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/

thabs la mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la sbyong na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod na/ denAmtshan m
la spyod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdaganange shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
pa/ spyod paste/de bsgom par bya'osnyam na/ denamtshan ma 'asbyod pa lags so// gal te 'di ma dusems ta/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ 'dani byang chub sems dpa' 'o snyam na/de namtshan ma la

spyod pa lags so/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam dusems te// gang ltar sbyod pa de ni shesapakyil rol tu phyin pa skamapa'o snyam na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de ni u0fb1nga chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mamakhas pa lags par rig par bgyi ba lags so// des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad cesasmasaso//

tshadad ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dapa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/kal dgazugs la gnas shing kun tu shes teyos/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
dad/ rnam nga bshos pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos la/ de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang/ de bzhin dutshorab dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/ gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes
pa' mngon par 'du byed pa la sprod pa yin no// gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la sbyod panas/ rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la sbyod pa ni/ don phyi malaskye ba las yongs
sum thar zhing/ don rga ba nas 'khrugs pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thon par kho bo 'o/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shesaM ba kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pan/ thabs lamamakhasapas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyan te/ yid kyi bar la gnas shing kun shes te mngon par zhen la mos par/
byed na/ denAtshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongasasum thor par kho bo sa'o// de bzhin du gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas
de bzhin du sbyar te/ gal te chos kyi bar la gnas shang kun tu shes te mos par byed na/ de tshe rabs phyi malasdugabasngal gyi bar las yodzasasum thon par kho bos+sa'o// gal tamag gi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'i bon dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba'i bar la nas shing kun tu shes dmos par byed na/ de na tshe phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongasasum
rgyu thar par kho bo 'o// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu nas mos par byed panas/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs pAcu nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas ashing kun s te mos par byed na/denatsho phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yodas sum than par bopo smra'o// den na thos

kyis 'am/'dasangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon sumadu bya ba'i skul ba'ang med na/ bla named pa yad dag pa'i rdzogasapa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de na gnas med do//

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbyong n thabs lamamakhas pa dang ldan zhing/ thabs lam mkhasapar rig par bya'o// de skad cesas pa dang/
tshe dang ldanupa shAr dra ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces saso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraji ltar na byang chubs mas pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dad ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs lam spyod/ tshor ba ded/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
dang/ rnam par shes pa lam spyod/ gzugs kyimtshan ma lam spyod/ tshon ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma lami spyod/ gzugs ga
ces bya ba 'am/ ma rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa gcesabya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzug
bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shosadang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mospyod//
gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba dang/ bdagamed ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya
bar mi spyod/gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya ba'am spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya
zab dang/ mi stong zhes bya ban maspyod/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pamed ces bya bar m spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pasmon
pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pamed ces bya bar maspyod/ gzugs zhizhes bya ba 'am/ ma ni zhes byabar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang
rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba'am sngod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba 'am/ ma dpen zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dur zhes dang/ 'du byed rnam/
! dang/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dban zhes bya bar mospyod/ gzugs kun s nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar maspyod/ de bzhin du tshor bdod/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam nga rangashes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar maspyod/ gzugs skya zhes bya ba 'am/ ma skya zhes bya bar maspyod/
de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skyo zhes bya ba 'am/ mi skya zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs 'gagaces bya ba 'am/ ma 'gag ces bya bar maspyod
00/de bzhin du tshon ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnamapanagasapa 'gag ces bya ba'am/ mi 'gag ces bya bar mispyod/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar mi

sbyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/dngos po med ces bya bar mispyod pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la de ltar spyod na thabs lamakhas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu 'diltar gzugs kyistod pa nyid gang yin
pa de gzugasam yin/ gzugs las gudana'ang stong pa nyid med stod pa de las gud na'ang gzugasamed de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa da yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang//
de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'istod pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa lasagung na'ang stong pa nyid med/ stod pa/
ted las gub na'ang rnam par shes pa med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin la/ rnam par shesapad kyang stong pa de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
kyi bar gyi stod pa nyid gang yin pa de gnadren pa stobagazhag pa rnams m yin/ dran pabar gzhag pa rnams las gdan 'angastong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las gudana'ang dran pa zheba'agazhag
pa rnams med de/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams nyid kyang skyod pa nyid yin la/stod pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pam yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las nyung na'ang stod pa nyid med/
stad pa nyid las gud na'ong 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad panyid kyang stod pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la'ang gzhan ma yin/ stod pa red kyang gzhan m yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gung na'ang stod pa nyid
med/ stong pa nyid las gungana'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stod pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ba

yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag nas nigs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyadam yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco/

brgyad las gudana'ang stong pa nyid med/ stod pa nyid las gudana'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pabaco brgyad medade/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyidakyang/

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasnod panasdod dozhes bya bar khasami
len rnamaspyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod lam spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar bsam len/ spyod pa'i ng ma yin/ ma spyod pa'i ngam payin zhes bya bar khasami len to// byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogasapar 'tshang rgyaba'i skalab dang ldan pa yin no//
de skad ces smras pa dang// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab la rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa na thams cad du las ma len/ smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu'adi ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs sumed do// de ci'i phyir zhe/

na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngosapo med pa'i do bo da yin pa'i phyirati/ shA 'drati'i bu rnamagrangs des nabyang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa

na khas ma lin to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ spyod pa'i ng ma yin/ma spyod pa'i ng ma yin zhes bya bde lta bur yang bsamalen to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de kyi rjesasu
zhugs pa dang/ gzung du med pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad nye bar len pa med pa rgya che/
ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di de dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po na
myun du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa bam po bcu gnyis pa/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di/

khon dang ma bral zhing ldan pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis 'tshang rgya/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ada myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon/

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chonapo rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang 'bar 'grob zhes bya ba yod de/ de la gnas ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin yodado// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yodado// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba'i rgyalamtshan tog ces bya ba'i nga nge 'dzin yod do//
chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyigatsug ltar me mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ nges

pa'i rgyal tshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nges pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang//

ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ brtson 'grusakyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yang dag par 'phag

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nges pa'i tshig lagadonami zabar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ tshigabla dgas la 'jug cid phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes
@#// bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ brjod pamed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ chos thams cad yang dag pa 'du ba rgyu mtsho'i phyag rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha'

khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbad po tog ces bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bkod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi chen
'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ tshol bamed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gnas la ston pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ti de 'dzin
dang/ sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dri ma med pa'i skyonam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pamathu' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i

de de 'dzin dang/ sha pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ klogagi sgron ma zhes byuba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

zad ma shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zad pa dang bralab zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ nges par rgyal ba zhosabyaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par

[r/ ]'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rima'i sgronam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba byed pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mchog gi 'byung gnasazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes togaces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tid de 'dzin dang/ kun

tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tade nge 'dzin dang/
chos thams cad mnyam bskyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba spongab zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dad/ chos kyi gnas pa'i spyi gtsug ces bya ba'i tid de 'dzin dang/ rnam par 'byor/
ba zhes byaba'i nga de 'dzin dang/ tshig thams cad rab pu'abyed pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yikimatum par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yi ga dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang/ dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ming nges bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dang de 'dzin dang/ gnas pa med pa'
spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
dayul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshog sasu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang/ dge ba'i me togargyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ spobs pamatha' yasapa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mamanyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ thams cad las 'da'ab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ shin tu rtag par byed pa zhes byaba'i ting
ra 'dzin dang/ nomanur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bkod pakachig pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa mngon
par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ srid pa'i 'damabu thams cad

du bud po med bar rnam par 'thor pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ bsdadang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgadabyang sakyi yaki dang bral ba zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgron ma

'bar ba zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa thamasacad kya mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzus kyi blo gros zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yang dag pa dang log bathams cad yang dag pa'i malab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ sgra bsgrags pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'gal ba dang

'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od dril med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ngang/ zla ba ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes ba'i tid
nge 'dzin dad/ bkod pa chen po zhes byapa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'jig rten thams cad la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i nga de 'dzin dang/

rdulamed cing rdul dang bralab dad ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thamasacad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ g.yo ba
med cing gnas pamed ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin nyid la gnasashidasomasamad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ lus kyiskyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas naam mkha' ltar gyur pazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' ltar chags pamed la rnam par grolag las rnam par grol zhingagos pamed pa zhes ba'i dpe ni/
'a@#/ yod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tid de 'dzin gang dag la gnas na/ myuradu bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'abyong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni 'di dag yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
tsa gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'daskad ces smras so// a la lade ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa de ni/ sngon
gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dkra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin la/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang yang dag par rjesasu ma mthong zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nisnyoms par ma zhugs pa dag
na bda gnas nyoms par zhugs pa'o// snyoms par 'jug go/ snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur rosnyam du ting nge 'dzin de dgagis kyang rlom sems su'ang ma byed la/ rnam par rtog pa de dag
thams cad de la med cing ma 'byung ngo// de skad ces smas pa dang// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dad ldan
pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakanga'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa dag gis lung bstan par rig par bya ba 'am/ snus pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma yin no// de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan zhig/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang gzhan ma
yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' da kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ de de 'dzin skyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su med tsang gtis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon gal te ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yad gzhan m yin te/ tid de 'dzin
nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' skyed kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang de gnyis shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa yin na ni/
[r]@#// de ltar n ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mashesashad kun shes pa'i d med par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de nyid kyisan/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chonapo'i ting nge 'dzin des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ma shesashing kun tu shes pa'i ngamedado// de ci'i phyir zhin/ smas pa/ byang chub sems dapa'i de/
dang/ ting nge 'dzin de dad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa nyid kyi phyir mashes shing kun tu shes pa'i ng med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa//
ba 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// khyod kyis tshig 'di na legs par smras so// 'di ltar khyod ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa
rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de la[） ]lur log pa 'di lakhyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa yin te/ byang nubasems dpa' sems dapa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab

par bya'o// bsam gtanagyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzodapa'i pha rol phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams lade ltar bslab par bya ba nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
[&/ ]dad [0f10 ]de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ban dag la de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'a// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po de ltar sloban/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sloban/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laslob pa yin te/ de'angam dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar slob na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar laslob pa yin pa nas/ de ltar
slob nas nigs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la slob pa yin te/ de'ang ma dmigs nga 'tshul gyis slob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunang bco ldan 'dasabadachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sloban/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laslob pa lags shing/ de'adamadamigs pa'i tshul gyis
slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nyen pho de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lamadamigs pa'i tshul gyisaslob pa
@#// no gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci zhigam dmigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs
sems can m dmigs pa nas/ shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar dum dmigs so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po rnams m dmigs/ khams rnams mi
dmigs/ skye mched rnams ma dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag nga 'i phyir/ ma rig pa mi dmigs pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du ma dmigs so// de bzhin du shin tu
rnam par dgapa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal ma dmigs/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lamam demags so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i
khams ma dmigs/ gzugs kyi khamasam domigs/ gzugs med pa'i khams ma dmigasaso// de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dran pa ltaba'agazhag pa rnams m dmigs
pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dum dmigs so// de bzhin shin tu rnam nga ra dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad kyibar du mi dmigasaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin badrugamidamigasaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin
du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa mdamigasaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rang sangs rgyas ma dmigs so//
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pami dmigasaso/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ de bzhinadu 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun s ton mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ dmigs
sumed pa dad chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pamed pade ni rnam par dag pa yin/ gsolapa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pan/
chos gang dag la bslab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shar dra ti'abubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo ltar slob pa na/ chos gang la'ang slab pa med do/
de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byas pasoso'i skye bo 'di dag mngon par zhan bde ltar chos 'di dag med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasaji ltor na chos 'di rigaji ltar
byis pa so so'i skyo bo 'di dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar mamachis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar med pas/
ma rig pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de dag ma mchis pa lags pa la/ ma rig pa zhes bgyi lags/ bcos ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// shArnadwa ti'i bu

nang stod pa nyid kyi phyi'i dad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo (de stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugasam do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi
phyir tshor ba da/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pamed do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ dran pa
bar gzhag pa rnan sa med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ nang stong pa nyid kyiban dad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi man gyi phyin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa
bco brgyad kyi bar du med na/ de la byis pa so so'i skye bom rig pa dang/ sred pa'i dbang gisa mngon par zhen pa de dag gis mngon par zhen nas/ yod pas yin pa la yod par brtags so//
de dkani 'di lta ste/ rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ dedaganami shesam mthong bsta/ chos gang dgamed pa de dag la kun tu rtog par byed do// brtags nas kyang ming
dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/ de bzhin du spyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mngon par zhenato// de dga mngon par zhen pa nyid yin pas na/ yod pa/
ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongasasu rtog par byed pa'i phyir/ de dganam shes ma mkhrodabangag yin no// de dkare zhig mi sam mthong zhe na/ gzugs ma shesam mthod ngo//
de bzhin du tshor ba dad/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pamingashasam mthong ngo// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
bar du mi shesam mthong ngo// gad ga phyir ma shesam mthong ba de'i phyir/ byis paso so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gad nas nges
par 'byud ba ma yin zhen/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dad/ gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byud ba ma yin no//
nyan shos dad radusangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su des par 'byung bam yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams su nges par 'byud ba ma yin no// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung bas yin no// de dgan yid mches pa dag yin te/ gzugs stong pa nyid du yid ma chesaso// de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid dad/ 'dushesastod pa/
@#// nyid dang/ 'du byed rnams stod pad dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid duyidamitshes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yid ma chesaso//
yad de dgan mi gnas pa dag yin// gang la mi gnas shin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas panas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la ma gnasaso// phyir maldeg
pa'i sa la me gnas ashid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ban lam gnas te// rgyu des n byas pasoso'i bo zhes bya/ mngon par zhen pa zhes bya'o// ci zhig la
mngon par zhen pa yin zhing/ de dag gang la mngon par zhen pa yin zhen/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin du mig la
mngon par zhen panas/ de bzhin du yid kyi bar la mngon par zhen to 3/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ drudang/ ro dang/ reg dad chos rnams la mngon par zhen to// de
bzhin du khams rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'dod chags dad/ zhesdad dad/ gtimug rnams la mngon par zhen to// ltabar gyur pa rnams la mdon par zhen to// dran pa
'bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ]
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sloban/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags ngashid/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu byed chub/
sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasob pa ma yin zhing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byudabam yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po spobs lamamakhas ngas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
phyin pa la rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phan pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phan padad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed cid mngon par zhon to// de bzhin du sbyar te songs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyabar du rtog par byed
cing mngon par zhen to// mngon par zhen nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par byed do// yongs su brtags nas kyang thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid la mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing/ rnam
zapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma
! lags mo da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nAshA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'ibyang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa laslob pam yin
zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ' chen posaji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la bslab par bgyi zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da dunges par 'byung ba lags M/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dra ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yad dag par rjes sum
mthong na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing/
rnamapa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid du ngesapar 'byung ba yin no// mdamigs pa'i ng gang zhe na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa
nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba la spyod pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de ltadam dmigs pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid kyi ban du ma dmigs pa ste/[】 ]shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa na/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasaci zhigam ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung
ba lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mdamigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad stong pa de kyabar dumadamigs pa'itshulagyi nges par
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das thog pa des gang nas nges par 'byung bar
'gyur/ theg pa de gad du gnas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gyur/ thag padagar dun sa rab 'byor des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar gyur/
zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/ de'ang gtisasu med pa'i tshul gyisaso// de ci'i phyir zhin/ 'di
ltar thegapa chen po gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba da gang yin pa'i chos de kas ka dad ldan pa 'ad ma yin/ ma ldan 'dam yin zhud/ gzugasamed pa/ bstan du med
pa thogs pamed pa// 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor mtshan dmad pa'i chos rnams n nges par ma 'byung ngo// nges
par 'byung bar ma 'gyur sa par mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byudabar 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyangs la
nges par 'byudabar 'dod du thadado// de bzhin du gung mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin da langes par 'byud bar 'dod du zad cing/ de ni yang
dganga'i mtha' la des par 'byung bar 'dod du khrid do// de bzhin du gung mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byud bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyisam khyab pa'i dbyangs la nges/
par 'khyud bar 'dod du zad do// gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byudabar 'dod du zad de/ gang mtshan nyid/
med pa'i chos rnams la nges pa/ra 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de bzhin du sbyar to mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges
par 'khyud bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang/ 'gog pa'i dbyings dang/ gzugs kyi stod pad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad d/ de bzhin du
tshon ba dang/ 'dur zhes dad/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa'i stod pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stod nga nyid ni
khams gsum nas ngos par 'byung ba ma yin zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dod 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la kAnas nga' ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs/
kyisastong/ de bzhin du tshor ba dad/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang
mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byudabar 'dod pa de ni mag gsong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de bzhin du sbyar te[）]
